name: Whispering Dream
description: Aisly is a little boy who was having his sweet dream after a long time. Different from the usual, he was engaged in quite a realistic dream. As he goes, someone was trying to wake him up from his sleep...?

name: Rooftops 2
description: Rooftops 2 is a Call of Duty 4 fan-made campaign that brings lots of visual improvements in the core game, a lot of assets and features are borrowed from the original Modern Warfare 2 and 3. It is a direct sequel of Rooftops, taking place immediately after it ends.

name: Cyberpunx
description: Doom2 episode with 9 levels with custom monster behaviour via Dehacked.

name: The DBK Holiday Special
description: The DBK Holiday Special is a 15-map Christmas adventure from the December Bastards Krew, which takes the holiday season into the darkest reaches of outer space. Fans of Alien Bastards! and Spaceballs: The Seque﻿l should be particularly interested in this one! ;)

name: Kunado Chronicles
description:
You wake up from a cold sleep upside-down in a tree. Watch out—It's the future.
In a world destroyed by ineffable monsters with no hearts, but an iron will; in a society warped and shaped by the constant threat of ruin; the dragon is already dead: Help what's left of humanity learn how to live in this post-apocalyptic fantasy visual novel.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan Vol. 9 - Samidare ha Nibiiro no Shirabe
description: I follow his shadow in the pale dull sky.... Eight years ago, the Kibukawa Detective Agency, another great detective.

name: Kleebuu Craves Fruit Salad
description: Explore your warped mind while solving platforming puzzles, in an tale that will unfold the deeper you get. Delve into the suppressed memories and remember how to leave this dream. Escape before the nightmares catch up... If you dream about fruit for long enough it's bound to turn rotten.

name: Mortal Kombat: Arcade Edition
description:
Main features of this project:

- A Lot of hacking to add new GFX details, Polishments, Timing improvements, Sound samples, New features… Master Linkuei did all this stuff with the help from Billytime!Games.
- Master Linkuei remade all the bio and ending screen using the arcade gfx as base. Including the 2 absent ending screens from Kano.
- Every graphic made by PROBE Software was completely changed or improved by Master Linkuei, Chev Chelios and Danilo Dias to look more accurate.
- New animations for the Courtyard (monks and tsung), Palace Gates (Flame), Warrior’s Shrine (Flame during Ermac fight) and Throne Room (Shang Tsung head + Shang Tsung clap).
- Added +80 sound samples from the Arcade!
- BillyTime!Games added a whole new SRAM system to save the Winning Streak name list.
- Improved gameplay removing delays and improving the whole timing.
- Option to change between original Music order or a more accurate one.

And MUCH more…

name: Super Mario Apocalypse
description:
A Super Mario 64 ROM hack.

Mario is dead and Bowser finally wins... Is it really the end for the Mushroom Kingdom? What a tough question to answer in this full remaster of the original Super Mario Apocalypse!

Featuring 100 stars with brand new redesigns, improved missions and exclusive assets, help Mario as a revived ghost fight back against Bowser and save the world once more.

name: 10 AM Funkin'
description: A christmas gift from Studio Shitballs, based on a scene from Elf starring Will Ferrel

name: Meria and the Island of Orcs
description: A flock of orcs suddenly appeared in a peaceful country town, and harmed the villagers. A novice sorcerer "Meria" accept to hunt the orcs from the mayor and face them in order to save the town.

name: New Lands
description: Grow wheat and build mills and mines. Restore your new lands and become a successful landlord.

name: The Haunted: Hells Reach - The Island
description: The Island - Welcome to the new level!

name: Mothered
description: An immersive first-person horror adventure where you play the role of LIANA - a young girl who arrives home after major surgery and is met with a strange mannequin claiming to be her mother.

name: Master Theft TVs
description: Master Theft TVs is arcade platformer with find and collecting items on levels for a certain time.

name: World Nations Game
description: World Nations Game is an online MMO game in which you can have your own virtual life. You can join a nation, buy vehicles, items, properties, open a political party, fight in international battlefields, participate in races, take part in special agent fights between agents from other countries, attack other citizens space colonies on any country map, be a nation senator or president, be part of the world congress, vote on nation issues and you can do many other activities.

name: New Year Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Axial Drift
description: Axial Drift is an online-multiplayer FPS-Z modding platform where you can create your own maps, skins, weapons, and game modes using Unreal Engine 4.

name: Latarnix Puzzle
description: Help the boar Latarnix as he passes through a variety of puzzles with obstacles to reach delicious golden apples at the end of each of the 50 levels in the game.

name: ArrowBase
description: ArrowBase is a Versus platform game where the objective is to send your arrow on your opponent. You can slide, dive forward, attack your opponent in close combat to propel him into the air.

name: Crow Story
description: Jump, dive, and platform through this minimalistic indie 3D platformer about a little crow trying to save his friends.

name: The Paribneur Combination
description: Make your way through the abandoned establishment of Paribneur Co. As you discover the hidden secrets and horrifying creatures of the building. Being forced to find a new way out of the building, you will face hard choices, choose carefully, your choices will affect the rest of the game...

name: Scientifically Accurate Dinosaur Mating Simulator 2021
description: It's just another day in the life of a dinosaur college student at Heck Creek University.

name: Two Envelopes
description:
Year 2999 inside a little cafe, half a mile below The Adamant Gambit's orbital construction site.

Two coffees - one black, one ice caramel.

name: Christmas Run
description: ChristmasRun is a runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as Santa Claus to bring a Merry Christmas to all!

name: Techwars Global Conflict: Heroic Edition
description:
TechWars Global Conflict is the world's first isometric mecha PVP-Action with direct control.

This Bundle will allow you to quickly master the management of new Mechs and get exclusive bonuses.
and gives you 3-Days Premium for fastest progression in the game.

name: Merry Christmas: Snowball Bubble
description: Enjoy the classic bubble game, where you can now discover the figures hidden in each of the snowballs.

name: Planet Quiz: Learn & Discover
description: How well do you know our amazing world? Find out and challenge yourself or your friends in Planet Quiz.

name: Pure Chase 80's
description: One of the most exciting Nintendo Switch chase games! PC80's is pure arcade, pure speed, pure adrenaline. Frantic driving, with no time to even blink.

name: Horror & Sports Pinball
description: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Christmas Racing
description: Christmas Racing is an action-packed racing game and your focus is to be the first and surpass your opponent. The terrain is treacherous, so you need to pay attention to your speed and really do everything you can to improve. This is the ultimate holiday-themed race where you must use all your skills and become a great driver. There are multiple cars to choose from and you will be impressed with the numerous gameplay mechanics and ideas. Check it out today and see if you can defeat all other drivers!

name: Fat Baby
description: In Fat baby multiple babies battle it out to get as fat as they can by eating and destroying everything around them. Traverse around a destructible environment while trying to avoid danger. Use your fat to buy abilities and use your abilities to wreak havoc on everything in your path!

name: Season's Greetings from The Smoke Room Team!
description: A small slice-of-life side story for The Smoke Room, in which the cast prepare for Christmas in a modern day alternate universe.

name: Fear Therapy
description: Fear Therapy, is a multiplayer(1-4) and single player psychological horror game.Try to complete the quests and leave the horror house before it is too late! Satan getting angrier every second and nothing holding it back.

name: Vegas Tales
description: A wealthy resort owner is dying and needs you to help him decide who should inherit his estate. You'll be interviewing some over-the-top characters and helping decide which of them most deserves to become extremely wealthy. Be careful, as there may be more to some than meets the eye.

name: Furry Love 2
description: Amazing Furry Beauties. Good Atmosphere, Great Music, Levels with Full HD Furry Artworks. Furry Love 2 is waiting for you! Music, 40 artworks, great for relaxing. Solve puzzles and other game modes, see beautiful furries! Join us!

name: Sneaky Kitten
description: Play as a "fluffy" cat and sneak around your mortal enemies, The Dogs! Steal their trinkets and work your way around their mansion without being seen! Sneaky Kitten is a non-violence game, that focuses on problem solving and sneakiness!

name: Wild Wet West
description: Wild Wet West - simplified dating sim with 3 charismatic girls to follow: local sheriff, dancer and innocent girl from Indian village. Your goal is to rob the bank - with or without help of those ladies.

name: Astro Universe
description: Astro Universe is a futuristic survival game where you have to visit and explore other planets! If you want, you can even make these planets habitable with the most modern technology or you can completely mine and use them for ores and other resources!

name: Lunaria: Virtualized Moonchild
description: Genius gamer T-Bit rakes in the prize money in VR races day after day. One day, after experiencing a network error mid-race, he ends up in Lunar World, a moon-based server. There, he meets an AI avatar by the name of Lunar-Q. A love story spanning the 384,400 km between the Earth and moon begins!

name: Impulse
description:
A free-to-play, play-to-earn first-person multiplayer shooter by Ascendance Games.

Play Impulse completely free by joining our training arenas where you can earn Common Credits just by getting eliminations to buy NFTs with real world value that you can trade or sell. Amp it up a bit by joining the Ascendance Credit arenas, where you can earn real money for every kill!

Join Deathmatch in a one versus all brawl, or play in a Teams mode to go up against another group of players in an all-or-nothing showdown. Earn DNA points as you play to fully customize your characters the way you want with our robust character creator. Start off by playing as a metallic Synth, to branch off and become a Human, Cyborg, Alien, or more!

You can adjust your character to be a large brute that can take more damage, or be smaller and nimble but make sure not to get hit!

name: Sonic Runners Reloaded
description: Sin descripción

name: Slenderman: Evidences
description: Slenderman is back, and he wants to play. Find 8 pages that have evidence of your innocence and dont look to Slenderman.

name: Retro Rewind
description: Retro Rewind is a custom track distribution for Mario Kart Wii that adds in every retro track from the series, from Super Mario Kart to Mario Kart 8 with a few from Tour, into the game.

name: The Runaway Girl and Me
description:
My life has just started together with this runaway girl. She's naturally rather closed-off and suspicious of me at first, but as we communicate and spend more time together, she comes to open up to me.
Living costs money, so you'll need to work in order to save some money to fully enjoy your new cohabitation life.Complete goals to trigger events, and progress the story.
Along the way, you might find better ways of making money, too.
Have fun spending time with your new cohabitant.

name: Summer Numbers
description: Challenging and fun puzzle game with beautiful hand-drawn anime illustrations.

name: Combat Master
description:
A fast-paced and performance-focused modern warfare first person shooter. Play Combat Master -- the ulimate FPS experience on your PC and Mobile. Best-in-class multiplayer gunfight. Next-level performance. And a whole lot more.
Whether you're a tactical professional, or simply love the tactical aesthetic, Combat Master provides a shooter gameplay that focus on the quality and innovation you're looking for.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Original Pack 5 (10th Anniversary 2)
description: Sin descripción

name: The Enchanted Worlds 2
description: Enchanted Worlds 2 is a puzzle adventure game from Syntaxity studio. Find an ancient artifact, following the clues from the books. At the same time, you have to explore many locations, look for items and interact with the environment. Touch the doorway to move from one location to another. When you find items, tap them to add them to your inventory. You can always see these things in a satchel. To use an item, select it, then tap the screen where you want to use it. Some puzzles require you to find clues to solve the puzzle: explore the area to find them. You can always use a hint if something does not work out for you.

name: Demons of Dex
description: You are Eino, a member of the druids. Your master, the archdruid has become old and it is time for somebody to replace him. As a young initiate you are sent to dungeon Dex, a mysterious labyrinth home to vile monsters. You must enter the dungeon alone and defeat three demon lords within. Can you achieve enlightenment and ascend to become the next archdruid?

name: Transport INC: Map Pack
description: Conquer 20+ new maps for the free play mode. Transport across Canada, Japan, South Korea, Africa, South America and more!

name: Ozonia
description: Ozonia is a 32 map megawad and third in the Moonblood trilogy. It's heavily inspired by Plutonia, but it has its own flavor to create a refreshing and unique classic Doom experience! Eviternity, Ancient Aliens, BTSX series and Monti's work are also other big influences.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai - Milky no Yabou
description:
Even if you cheat, if you win you're in the right! If you lose you have to strip! Have a dreamy time exchanging tiles with beautiful girls.

This work, which was previously released on feature phones, is a side story of Jaleco's beautiful girl competition mahjong game "Idol Janshi Suchie-Pai" series.

Milky Pie, an alien in the form of a rabbit's ``Chikyu-Seifuku Project'' begins in earnest!
Seifuku... Seifuku... That means everyone's "uniform" is in danger! ?

Idol mahjong player Suchie-Pai, a self-proclaimed righteous heroine, stands up to face the shameless crisis of the earth! !

Make full use of "loading (cheating)" by consuming points and "Suchie Stick" to draw Tsumo, win the mahjong match with beautiful girls, and steal everyone's "uniform" before Milky Pie. ! !

Enjoy two-player mahjong with reward CG, online rankings, and anything goes.

name: Roasting Report: A Professor Murder
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Spell Bubble: Character Pack - Suwako Moriya
description: The new character pack is here at last! Our first installment contains the Highest of Native Gods, Suwako Moriya! She has the ability to turn Blank Bubbles into the more user-friendly Awakening Bubbles, and she's got three special spell cards.

name: Space is Hard
description:
Turn based space combat

Lonely in space, others might not want you to be, so, fight it is...
you could say this is a game about apanthropy!

name: Ultraman: Fighting Heroes
description: Mobile Fighting game featuring character from the Ultraman series.

name: Escape Master
description: This is a completely free jailbreak adventure casual game. You can pass the level after completing the designated tasks, but becareful with the guards on patrol. After the character is upgraded, you can improve your own attributes, such as movement, stamina, intelligence, Come and try the challenge!

name: Jolly Laughter
description: An interactive Christmas card.

name: V-Fighter 2000
description: v-fighter 2000 - Fans of furious action will appreciate the intensity of passion in this shoot 'em up game. Hop into the cockpit of your starship and embark on a long journey across the galaxies, destroying hordes of enemies ..

name: Eldritch Lands: The Witch Queen's Eternal War
description: Dive into a dark fantasy world and fight against the endless undead horde. Unlock, upgrade and deploy units in a simple to understand yet engaging strategy gameplay loop. Grow plants that grant exp bonuses and converse with each unit to learn more about their character and backstory.

name: Asteroids Extreme
description: Asteroids Extreme is a fast-paced, top-down, arcade-style asteroid mining adventure. Players blast asteroids and various enemies, collecting crystals along the way to upgrade their ship.

name: Bongo Quest
description: bongo quest - a bright colorful platformer for lovers of prehistoric adventures is waiting for you! Embark on an unforgettable journey through an ancient world inhabited by dangerous plants and aliens, hidden in the foliage of a primeval jungle.

name: Deep Cave
description: Deep Cave is a roguelike game about the adventures of a brave dwarf in search of great riches.

name: Kingdom of Dinza
description: A top-down 2D, procedurally generated, open world fantasy RPG. Explore wild areas, forests and dungeons, fight monsters and craft superior weapons and armor as you uncover the mysteries and overcome the challenges of the Kingdom of Dinza!

name: Paintball
description: Are you ready for bright colors?

name: Dungeon Reels
description:
Drafting, Slot Machines, and Infinite Replayability!
Dungeon Reels!
Enter a Dungeon equipt with a Slot Machine of powerful spells. Defeat enemies and add new spells to your Slot Machine.
Encounter procedurally generated dungeons with tons of variation! Creating a unique experience every time you play.
Draft a Slot Machine that is powerful enough to take down the final Boss!

name: Grandma Eugenia's Foolproof Plum Pudding for the Holidays
description:
Year 3599 aboard the Adamant Gambit.

We'll have to make a few substitutions...

name: Football Cup 2022
description: Live and breathe the beautiful game recreated with unparalleled realism of futbol! Choose one of the favorites such as Argentina, Spain or Brazil, or help one of the outsiders achieve the first place. Train, develop yourself, come to the field, and be a soccer star! Once you try to play these soccer games 2022and you won’t stop, it’s all because of the real football game feeling. You will find not only classic soccer game but also many other futbol modes.

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures
description: Moorhuhn 'Traps and Treasures' for Nintendo Switch brings 21 challenging levels + 6 bonus levels full of dangerous traps, devious enemies and hidden treasures!

name: Jigsaw Fun: Greatest Cities
description: Solve 100 jigsaw puzzles of Greatest Cities. Puzzle solo or together in multiplayer for up to 4 players!

name: Shinya Ichizoku: The Battle for Hokkaido's Delicious Foods
description: Hokkaido, Japan's Kingdom of Gastronomy! In this action game, members of the popular Japanese TV show "Shinya Ichizoku" fight off aliens who have attacked Hokkaido in an attempt to steal it. Play against the aliens who attack 179 cities, towns and villages in Hokkaido. By controlling your character, you can collect Hokkaido's specialties and delicious ingredients that appear on the screen, and give them to the goal, the bear, for points. As you progress through the game, you will collect various Hokkaido delicacies, which will be added to your "Picture Book". Let's collect all the delicious foods of Hokkaido!

name: Santa Throw
description: Create the Magic of Christmas and help Santa deliver gifts to all the children. But be careful Grinch is watching!

name: Arcade Archives: Orius
description: Orius is a shooting game released by Konami in 1991. Pilot the cutting-edge fighter craft, Flintlock, and solve the mystery of what happened on planet E-Square. In this game, in addition to your usual shots, you can use the mysterious Flint life form for attack and defense.

name: Picross S7
description: The seventh entry in the Picross S series adds more puzzles in the same familiar model, with the addition of touchscreen controls.

name: Dead Dating
description:
A romantic summer date party gone wild! A sweet party becomes a murder scene...
you have to find a way to survive in an isolated mansion on an isolated island with ten guys! Can you rescue your lover and catch the killer?

name: Tetsudou Nippon! Rosen Tabi: Sangi Tetsudou-hen
description:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

In this entry, the setting is the Sangi Railway Hokusei Line, which runs in Mie Prefecture. The Hokusei Line has an extremely rare feature that the track gauge is narrow which is unique in Japan. Because the track width is narrower than the width of both arms spread, it is necessary to slow down specially on the curves. You can enjoy the train driving experience by running at low speed and enjoy the beautiful scenery.

You can drive through a 20.4km trip from Nishi-Kuwana Station to Ageki Station, on the aforementioned Sangi Railway Hokusei Line.

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Empires - 20th Anniversary Box
description:
The 20th Anniversary Box includes:
- The Game
- 94 Character Cards, stand included
- Original Soundtrack (2 CDs)
- Special 20th anniversary selection artbook of the 94 characters

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star for Nintendo Switch
description:
It's been a year and a half since Nanami Haruka graduated from Saotome Shining's school of performing arts. Having signed with Shining Studios, Nanami is constantly looking for her big break, however, it just hasn't come yet, and if she fails to write a brilliant song before the second year is up, her contract will be terminated.

Thirteen Princes are at her rescue, she is going to face a different challenges with each of them. With the senpai idols, she'll have to write something for the music festival, with the teachers from the previous series, she'll have to handle the direction of their changing relationship. And with the seven princes who graduates with her, she will have to write a song for all seven of them, however, her final partner is but one of these princes.

So who is your prince?

name: Sakura no Kumo: Scarlet no Koi - Complete Limited Edition
description:
Box contents:
- Game: Sakura no Kumo * Scarlet no Koi
- B2 tapestry
- Consumer version "Sakura no Kumo ＊ Scarlet no Koi" Opening Song "Yumemi Hanabira"
- Telegram version Memo Book

name: Sakura no Kumo: Scarlet no Koi
description: This is the consumer port of the title that was released as a PC game in September 2020. For the consumer version, new episodes drawn by the original team of Riko Hakoeda and Tom Fuyuakane have been added. In addition, a new opening and theme song have been added, and the cast has also been renewed to bring you all the charm of the consumer version.

name: Martial Law
description: Martial Law is a game about difficulties that came with Communism in Poland. The story is shown from the perspective of a man who is abandoned because of his low social status. He tries his best to be there for his daughter despite the difficulties.

name: Kor
description: Explore an alien world, meet a variety of eccentric characters, unveil an unconventional story, and experience a combat system that blends turn-based strategy with skillful combo execution in this classically-inspired retro RPG adventure!

name: The Singularity Trials
description: The Singularity Trials is a VR Swordplay & Physics game where you attack and rebound droids on to targets for massive score multipliers. Defend yourself from incoming attacks! Choose between 3 Solar factions and emerge as their champion. Are you ready to beat the trials?

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Empires
description: Combining the 1 vs. 1,000 action of Dynasty Warriors with the addition of strategic elements, including unit command, Dynasty Warriors 9 Empires sets players on a quest to conquer ancient China by both sword and strategy. Powerful Siege Battles enable commanders to deploy units to capture strategic points on the map like castles. Experiencing high-stakes fights at every turn, players can now take control of these central points on the battlefield through the use of fire attacks or other stratagem, siege weapons, and, at times, simply by force as commanders execute their strategies and attack enemy troops by issuing vital commands to units throughout the skirmish.

name: Scarf
description:
Scarf is a 3D Adventure game, where protagonist Hyke must use his polymorphic scarf to explore a magical environment, solve mysterious puzzles and overcome difficult challenges. Hyke’s scarf morphs into different objects which will help to progress the adventure. Hyke was born in an unknown place, surrounded by other souls. All of them will start a path through the World with the main goal being to meld with it and become part of nature.

"Mixing walking simulator and 3D platformers, Scarf is an atmospheric and emotional journey about what it means to be a hero. Travel to three beautiful crafted worlds and discover your true destiny."

name: Mirage: Perfect Skyline
description:
Mirage: Perfect Skyline is a new MMORPG with gods and demons-based theme, offering a variety of well-designed team events. No longer do you have to face the world alone! Whether to become a demon or a god… The choice is in your hands…

This title was released multiple times under various different names:
- Mirage: Perfect Skyline
- Advent of God: Legends [Indonesian]
- Dark Continent: Mist [Indonesian]
- Stellar/Starfall Fantasy: Neverland
- Lost Sanctuary: Eternal Origin
- Jade Legends: Immortal Realm [Indonesian]

name: Banjo-Kazooie: How the Gruntch Stole Christmas
description: A mod for Banjo-Kazooie inspired by How the Grinch Stole Christmas.

name: Love and Passion
description: Sin descripción

name: Capture Corps: Archipelago
description: Here, at Capture Corps Incorporated we are specialized in discovering the secrets of the most remote ocean places on earth. We provide to our employees the latest technological gear, bundled with experimental features. Now grab your waterproof coat and join us, we need you to collect some precious data on some remote archipelago.

name: Animus Toil
description:
Animus Toil is an experimental puzzle-adventure video game built for Game Boy, Analogue Pocket, PC, and web browser.

The Temple of the Herring was a legend to the people of Thera. Cursed by an evil wizard known only as Somnus, the temple strikes the curiosity of two explorers seeking answers. Who exactly is Somnus? Why is the temple cursed? What is the secret behind the mysterious artifacts? And how does this tale all tie into the future of our humanity?

name: Cube Fight
description: Cube Fight is a simple 2D shooter game that you can play and chill out with your friends. Here you can find abilities that will randomly spawn across the map and velocity-based player movement giving you a dynamic gameplay experience. What are you waiting for? Download the game and check it out by yourself!

name: Ribbit
description: Ribbit is a massive variety mod based on Deltarune Chapter 1, that tells an entirely new story about frogs, ghosts, and the strange powers that surround them both. Half a joke mod, half a character-driven mystery narrative, it is an experiment in seeing just how far Deltarune modding could be taken during the 2019-2021 period, retaining Deltarune's familiar locations, while inserting new custom scenes and gameplay mechanics into them.

name: Dungeon and the Hole
description: A casual game played in the world of roguelike RPG "Dungeon and Gravestone".

name: Treasure Girl 3D 2
description: “Treasure Girl 2” is our new game with 2 beautiful naked girls in different poses. With awesome 3D animation!

name: Beyond the Board
description: Explore this strange land, play board games, meet other explorers, and battle them around a game table! Beyond the Board allows you to play mini games, and two different board games, Apogee and Light Hunters.

name: Aim Lab VR
description: The #1 FPS Trainer of choice for over 20M players is now available in VR! Jump into immersive aim training environments featuring popular tasks, an exclusive Arcane experience, targets of terror survival & a music rhythm challenge.

name: Wrapped With a Kiss
description: A Christmas Themed Otome Game featuring 50k words, partial voice acting, and custom art.

name: Rhentsu
description: Embark on this adventure in search of a mysterious galactic artifact, full of action and sensual women. Fight different bosses and find out what can happen if this artifact falls into the wrong hands.

name: Intralism: Rebuild
description:
Intralism: Rebuild - fast and hard rhythm game. Listen to music and match arcs to the beat. Master all beatmaps or create your own and challenge friends with online multiplayer. But remember: wrong button - failed try.

This is a rebuild-remake of the original Intralism. It's main idea is to fix all the remaining issues of original game. The main focus of development was on the maps editor and global ranking. Players are able to easily add their favorite music into the game and play it with friends.

name: The Happy Dismal Town
description: A funny and dramatic game telling the story of a detective. NOIR themed with a cyberpunk background with elements of Lovecraftian horror story.

name: Adventure Rush
description: Get ready for another incredible adventure, face spiders, monsters and goblins in a side scrolling system with Shoot 'Em Up elements and try out numerous equipment with your hero. But beware of the fearsome Dragon!!

name: Loco Shortline Operations
description: This is an open world rail builder simulator with physics based Locomoves, trucks, cranes or boats.

name: Tornuktu
description: Tornuktu is a short winter horror game with one ending, made in two weeks.

name: Jane the Reaper
description: 3D action side-scrolling game with a disaster story.

name: Tcstrikers4
description: This is the biggest news title of 2021. A cute bullet-hell shooter is now available. The game features cool and futuristic visuals and active gameplay.

name: Paunch 2
description: Multiplayer dodgeball ashore and underwater. Full physic body movement, touching and knocking. Emotions, Poses, Interactions. Up to 6* players to warm-up.

name: Lobster Game
description: Lobster Game is a reaction speed game, a chain of puzzles and QTE mini-games in which you need to apply all your talents, both obvious and hidden.

name: Ritual Tournament
description: Ritual Tournament is a 2d Fighting Game with retro style gameplay and story. Choose between 8 fighters, to take part in a deadly tournament, with a story inspired by the 80s movies and also the classic Fighting Games from that age, mixed with a mystical, dark, mythology.

name: Wave Jumper
description: Wave Jumper is a 80's Synthwave platformer aimed at keeping momentum high and decisions quick.

name: Rescue Team: Power Eaters
description: Embark on an electrifying adventure to save the world from a robotic menace! As the leader of the Rescue Team, you will guide your courageous crew as it attempts to shut down the Power Eaters before they turn Earth into a huge ball of lightning!

name: Fish Story: Gourmet Puzzle
description: The new adventures of Lucian and his friend XO! This time the friends are traveling through mysterious planets in search of delicacies!

name: Learn to Code RPG
description: Learn to Code RPG is a visual novel game. In this game, you will teach yourself to code, make friends in the tech industry, and pursue your dream of becoming a developer.

name: Bayonetta and Bayonetta 2 Digital Bundle
description: Strap on your heels (and the attached guns) in two nonstop action games. Use your witchy powers to conquer both heaven and hell in the critically-acclaimed Bayonetta and Bayonetta 2 games. Meet the baddest witch around—Bayonetta Originally released in 2010, the unforgettable first chapter of the Bayonetta saga introduced the world to "climax action", an explosive blend of dynamic action and saucy style. Armed with a weapon in each hand and one on each foot, Bayonetta destroys her opponents with combo attacks that are as beautiful as they are brutal. Fight like hell to save your soul-less sister in Bayonetta 2 In this climactic sequel to the critically acclaimed Bayonetta action game, you’ll be on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Brimming with jaw-dropping battles and even more abilities , this game never lets up on the action.

name: Di-Da-Dobble
description: A weird Yahtzee-like toy. Roll your beloved dice, collect cool props like plants, worms, and snacks by opening presents, and climb the ranks on the di da dobble leaderboards!!!

name: Point of Light
description:
A new game was created to impress people and give them something new!

The colors are chosen carefully to immerse player in the atmosphere of the game.

Avoid the figures and reach the highest score, with the points you can buy not only the skins but also new figures for developing your skills.

And stay concentrated! The game does not spare anyone!

name: Gardener's Path
description:
An immersive 2D puzzle experience about sustaining natural harmony.

Gardener’s Path is a top-down turn-based puzzle game, about fighting giant insects and protecting underground gardens.

Fulfill your duty as a gardener, and fight against the pest of giant insects, to protect the ones you love.

name: Attraction
description: Attraction is a game about the search for answers. You are a friendly explorer robot, searching for answers in a far away planet. Discovering hidden items, dialogues and upgrades. Harness the power of the cosmos with your matter gun in this clever and minimalist adventure-puzzle-platformer.

name: Let's Sing 2022 with German Hits: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: I'm on Observation Duty 4
description: Fourth instalment in the indie horror game series "I'm on Observation Duty". A spot the difference -type of puzzle horror game. Monitor live surveillance camera footage and spot anomalies ranging from furniture movement to intruders. Fix anomalies by filing a reports describing the type and location of the anomaly. You will need sharp eyes and good memory. The goal is to survive from 00:00 to 06:00.

name: Battle Strike World War
description: An epic platform fighter for up to 8 players online. Try casual, or invite friends to a private room. Play cross-platform with millions of players on Android and Steam! Frequent updates. Over Many Characters.

name: Dungeon Royale
description: Dungeon Royale is an action-rpg battle-royale with rogue-lite elements. Slay the other adventurers to win the game or die and rebirth as a monster of the dungeon to get your revenge!

name: Boppio
description: Boppio is a game about obtaining materials, constructing buildings, and assembling a spaceship to return home. In order to succeed you will need to automate and optimize your base. Mine minerals and combine them into new items that will help you build your return vessel.

name: World Wide Hack
description: World Wide Hack is an MMO simulation game about realistic hacking and cybersecurity. Collect the most effective sets of hacking and security tools, gather assets, and improve your computer to hack others, control parts of the network, or create the best websites and tools which will help other hackers and make you rich! Work with others to make your experimental activities useful for your faction and lead with them the world in the right direction.

name: Twin Ruin
description: Twin Ruin - Ikaruga meets geometry wars

name: Blood Bound: Dark Solstice
description: Bloodbound: Dark Solstice is a holiday special book of the Bloodbound series.

name: Danganronpa Croxx: The Beginning of the Despair Plan
description: Danganronpa Croxx is a Korean fan game based on the Danganronpa Series.

name: Ruby: Huntress of Vale
description: Ruby: Huntress of Vale is an alternate universe fan project centered around a 2D action beat-em-up game. This project is based on the web series RWBY originally by Monty Oum & Rooster Teeth.

name: Bot.vinnik Chess: Late USSR Championships
description: Miss me already, comrade? A wise human once said: "Attackers may sometimes regret bad moves, but it is much worse to forever regret an opportunity you allowed to pass you by." So don't let this one pass! Enroll Now and be prepared to learn from the real masters!

name: We Are Not Free
description: Sin descripción

name: Sudoku
description: Fill every square and enjoy this classic logic puzzle game, featuring five difficulty levels and a smart hint system for beginners.

name: The Last Matches
description:
Who would buy matches on Christmas Eve? On a cold, snowy Christmas Eve, the girl strikes her first match in the darkness, illuminating memories she’d since buried deep. Will the last matches give her the strength to keep going?

Inspired by the tragic fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen, together we bring you an alternate story of a maybe happier ending and a happier life for the little match girl.

name: Operation Gekkou
description: Operation Gekkou is the effort to turn the story of GGZ into a Visual Novel with refurbished English translations. It is intended to make the story more accessible to the English speaking audience, as well as improve upon the text and translations. Additionally, it is meant to encourage players to support the game by playing through the game’s stages on the Japanese servers.

name: Dwarven Destiny
description: A visual novel in which you are a human mage, summoned to the Dwarven Kingdom of Stonepeak to discover the origins of a mysterious artifact that's been recently unearthed. There you can romance six pursuable Dwarves.

name: The Holoween collection
description:
The Holoween collection is a set of 3 games featuring HoloMyth's halloween costumes from the Holoween stream!
Play as Amelia Watson, Gawr Gura and Ninomae Ina'nis in their cute outfits!

Pumpkin Party, Ame's game, is a first-person shooter where you fight hordes of pumpkin creatures!
Pick your powerups wisely, as the pumpkin mutations will make your life hard!

Dr. Ninomae's evil laboratory of dangerous experimentations is a puzzle game where you use MATHS to help Ina transform Takodachis into perfect creatures!

Gawrzilla attacks lets you wreak havoc in a city as the most adorable kaiju ever, Gura!
Destroy skyscrapers and dodge nukes to score millions of points!

name: Man or Muppet
description: An essay on muppets and my trans life.

name: RLCraft
description:
This started out as a simple little thing I was putting together for my own server and friends, and since then it's turned into something pretty ridiculous. I've gotten some requests about releasing it as a modpack so here it is.

RLCraft, the RL standing for Real Life or Realism and is a take on another mod I made for Unreal called RLCoop that generally has a similar goal, is my interpretation of what I've always wanted in Minecraft when it comes to pure survival, adventuring and RPG, and immersion. I hand selected many mods and individually tweaked each and every one to fit the exact play-style I was looking for, making sure they all worked fluidly with each other, adding my own custom scripts for various changes to vanilla behavior, etc.

Bottom line is, this ain't your dad's Minecraft, and you're going to die...a lot. Just be prepared for that. This tends to happen whenever I make mods for any game for some reason...it usually ends up being unfairly difficult.

name: DuskBreakers
description: DuskBreakers is a sci-fi inspired metaverse and gaming experience powered by blockchain. The choices we make collectively will irrevocably change the course of history across an exciting new alternate universe, unfolding across NFTs, comics, animations, and play-and-earn video games.

name: Concordia: Digital Edition - Corsica & Gallia
description: An official DLC to Concordia: Digital Edition adding two new maps - Gallia and Corsica with their unique mechanics - all of which will add variety and new challenges to your games!

name: Paper Enchantress
description: Paper Enchantress - это романтическое приключение полное магии, судьбоносных решений и прекрасных принцев. Что откроется за таинственной дверью?

name: Christmas Celebration With Sakuya Izayoi
description: Celebrate Christmas with Sakuya Izayoi from the Touhou Project in this cozy visual novel! Explore the colourful sights of the human village in Gensokyo as it hosts a one of a kind festival with several venues and gorgeous sights to see!

name: Pinball Groupies
description: You are a world champion Pinball Wizard, at the top of your game, and the fans love a winner... in this case I mean they really LOVE a winner! Play through 8+ different challenging levels of hot pinball action and excitement! The higher you score, the friendlier the fans get! It's time to score!

name: Winter Sports Games: 4K Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Seraph's Last Stand
description: Create insane builds and break the game in all possible ways to get your name into the leaderboards! Seraph's Last Stand is an indie action shooter game where every round you get stronger, but so does the enemies...

name: Knight Runaway
description: Knight Runaway is a platformer filled with various mechanisms and levels, each of which challenges the skills and nerves of the player.

name: Argonauts Agency: Captive of Circe
description: The Argonauts Agency – An invitation to a wedding sets in motion an incredible investigation with an unexpected twist!

name: Marble Computing
description: Using only marbles and gravity, solve logic problems in surprising ways!

name: Endless Zombie Weekend
description: Endless Zombie Weekend is an endless arcade game with RPG elements. It's hard to be the only survivor after the apocalypse. How often do you think about it? As the main character of the game, you can feel it! Upgrade your weapons and try to survive as many days as possible.

name: Present Cannon Rebirth
description: Action/Arcade/Rail-Shooter. It's Christmas Eve and it's up to you to save Christmas, by delivering all the Christmas presents while saving people from an alien invasion, using only your magic Present Cannons.

name: Solar Cage
description: You have one job: BLOW UP THE SUN. A game perfect for parkour/shooter fans, speedrunners, and those looking for an extra challenging experience!

name: Crazy World
description: Open-world life simulation RPG. Non-linear story, you decide who to join and who to fight. You can become anything you want to be, from a criminal to a businessman. Procedurally generated open World.

name: September 28 Pizza
description: On this top down shooter game, put yourself in Chad Jones' shoes by delivering pizza as a zombie apocalypse unfolds!

name: Pog 6
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Hundred Days: Napa Valley
description: Explore the napa valley region and its grape varieties. Continue your journey in the winemaking world and prove to be the best.

name: Koala Rush
description: Koala Rush is a fast-paced 2D endless runner game with increasing speed and progressive difficulty.

name: Mystical Riddles: Snowy Peak Hotel - Collector's Edition
description: Your journalist friend went missing while investigating weird happenings in a mysterious hotel. You are the only one who can save her and uncover the truth before it’s too late. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Conquicktory
description: Conquicktory is a minimalistic turn-based strategy focused on top-level decisions in your civilization's development. You'll control the diplomacy relations with neighboring countries, declare wars, plan the key strikes and distribute funds to the peaceful/military issues. Your subjects will do the rest of work - there is no need to deeply micromanage all the aspect of your glorious growing empire.

name: Initializing Maintenance Run: We're Good to Go.
description:
Who've we got on shift today?

Year 3484 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: Flipping Beat
description: Flipping Beat is an intense rhythm game where you blow up the beats of adrenaline-pumping music as they fly towards you, surrounded by an abstract world.

name: Grimscape
description: Open world deck building game set in RPG style fantasy setting

name: Conqueror's Blade: Season X - Highlanders
description: Battle for the heart and soul of the Highlands in Season X: Highlanders, based on the rich history and legends of Scotland. Season X features three unlockable Highlander units with several new mechanics, a siege map based on the lush green valleys of Scotland, treasure to be earned from the Battle Pass, and so much more.

name: Tiny Stories: Santa Closes
description: Santa Closes is a short point & click adventure in which you take on the role of an Elf whose sole mission is to save Christmas with is friend Pingui... but those poor devil will soon find how hard spreading that holiday cheer can be.

name: In Next Life
description:
In next Life is a crafting, survival, and civilization building game, where collaboration with other players gives you very real advantages (it is possible to play alone, but it will be harder to survive). Your technology level starts at stone age level, and then it's up to you and your village members to invent and craft tools and technologies such as fire, baskets, spears, ..., in order to survive easier and to advance to new development stages. Time moves quickly and each game played equals one life, including birth, childhood, adulthood and old age.

The goal of each life is to contribute as much as possible to the survival and development of your village, children and future descendants. What you leave behind will be the foundation for others to keep building on. The flint spear you invented one life, could turn out to be the difference between survival and annihilation for your whole civilization. There are hundreds of objects you can craft, collect, cook, and eat. We intend to add at least 1,000 more during the Early Access period.

name: Noah's Heart
description: Immerse yourself in intense battles with enemies from evil factions. Explore uniquely designed dungeons. Choose and build weapons and skills that best suit your style of play. Noah’s Heart is a next-generation MMORPG. Explore the planet Noah and uncover its secrets with your friends! Adventure and fortune await you, explorers!

name: Lost Alone
description: Cresciuto con la nonna paterna dopo che il padre è stato arrestato per l'omicidio della madre, George esce dalla spirale della dipendenza da alcol conoscendo Hanna, la sua fidanzata. Ma i suoi traumi infantili, torneranno presto a tormentarlo spingendolo nel baratro della disperazione.

name: Dungeon Overseer
description: Dungeon Overseer fills a void in that super fun RTS genre. Don the crown and pursue glory by building a unique dungeon layout, constructing your lair, upgrading and expanding, questing, crafting, researching, recruiting, defending your base, and raiding.

name: RC Airplane Challenge
description: Fly model airplanes in RC Airplane Challenge in this arcade styled flight sim. Fly by yourself offline or with up to 32 other players in online gameplay.

name: Yuko and the Akuma Menace
description: Yuko and the Akuma Menace is a top-down, grid based movement, adventure maze game set in a ninja world of fantastic creatures and magic. Fight monsters with your kunai, shurikens and smoke bombs. Cross dangers using the magical orbs, and save the world from the greatest threat ever.

name: Medium-naut
description:
This is an SF-horror/action game created by Takumi Naramura, creator of the hit 2D action series La-Mulana.
Naramura’s first foray into solo game development in years.

name: Biosys Inc
description: Biosys Inc. is a biology simulator that takes you to a new planet where you will be responsible for the process of abiogenesis. Start with a single cell and watch your ecosystem thrive by itself. All cells carry DNA that will allow them to mutate and evolve into complex beings.

name: Sunny-Place
description: A game about driving rocket cars with your friends, furnishing a space apartment, picking a cool outfit and playing a simple cardgame.

name: Red Cap Zombie Hunter
description: Human Resistence leader, hires Red Cap as ZOMBIE HUNTER. Red cap will receive information about the areas that are full of zombies and need to be "cleaned" and also about the most strong zombies that are starting to manage their own armies.

name: Watch Over Christmas
description: The story of Cisco, a 12-years old boy who embarks on an amazing journey to save Christmas as we know it.

name: Bowser's Revenge
description: A romhack for SMW with 67 exits

name: Dead Girl's Notebook
description:
Dead Girl's Notebook is a visual novel about love, personal growth, self-acceptance, masochism, etc. haphazardly assembled across 15 days for Variety Megajam 2021.

It has 10 chapters, and a little over 20,000 words of narration and dialogue. It is probably around 1 to 2 hours long, depending on how quickly you read. (If you use "auto mode", which advances text automatically at a relaxed pace, it is about 2 hours and 15 minutes long.)

name: Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 Black
description: A mod that rebalances the difficulty in Ninja Gaiden Sigma 2 to something closer to the original 2008 version of Ninja Gaiden II

name: Cov Shooter
description:
Try to survive as many waves as possible.
Upgrade your weapons and stats to be able to coop with the new mutations.

name: Discover the Ocean
description:
The ocean: A world of mystery and secrets. But what lies beneath the surface?

Discover the Ocean - brought to you by the Ocean Exploration Program

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Christmas Pack
description:
This DLC includes 3 vehicles:
- Rockin' Santa Sled
- Bazoomka
- Synkro

name: Afterlife
description: Be permeated by the adrenaline-pumping gameplay worthy of the most famous shooters and survive the rise of madness! Experience the chaos and human perversion firsthand. This adventure will take you from the dark streets of DreamCity to the higher floors of the corporations that control it.

name: Jewel Match Atlantis Solitaire 3: Collector's Edition
description: Plunge into an all-new Atlantis Solitaire adventure! Explore more than 800 (!) detailed aquatic levels and rebuild breathtaking waterscapes to restore Atlantis to unparalleled splendor. Dive into the brilliant world of Jewel Match Atlantis Solitaire 3!

name: Blocky Snake
description: Blocky Snake is a scoring arcade runner.

name: Mimicry
description:
Mimicry is a battle royale (8 vs 1) and online horror action game in the horror genre: one monster hunts eight survivors who want to avoid a terrible death.
Unpredictable matches, cool character customization, voice chat during battle, various locations and scary monsters are waiting for you in this online horror game!

name: Stalks Stalks Stalks
description: Stalks Stalks Stalks is a turned based, competitive, "stock simulation" where you hope to make more money than every one else. If you play by yourself, you'll always win! Try your luck against friends or strangers, and you'll likely lose!

name: Shankaram: Code Reborn
description: Shankaram is a third-person shooter, story-based detective game. In where you play as a government agent using your unique ability to fight back against corruption. Investigating from shady slums to big MNCs with the help of your tactical strategies and surviving in forest to flooded rural areas.

name: 100 Hidden Animalnaults: Felicat & Laika
description: Can you find the cat Felicat and the little dog Laika? They are in replica rockets and space stations!

name: Artists of Fortune: Paint by Numbers! - Spirit of Christmas Ep. 6
description: Merry Christmas and Happy New Year! Paint by numbers and immerse yourself in a fairy atmosphere!

name: Search All: Foxes
description: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the foxes on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling". The location shows a Chinese city

name: Collector Thief
description: Committing crimes has never been more complex. In "Collector Thief" every step counts. Understanding the placement of guards or cameras is essential for the robbery to be a big hit and you can move forward.

name: Istanbul Ship Simulator
description: Istanbul Ship Simulator is a simple and fun ship simulation game located in the city of Istanbul. You can play all 22 challenging mission or choose any ship you like and sail at the coasts of Istanbul.

name: CorpseOcean
description: Pilot a tiny submersible on a job to retrieve organic material from a sunken navy sub. Follow the coordinates, use Sonar and hope you don't run into anything on the way.

name: Temperature Adjustment Log #1587325
description:
The walks are longer, now, than they used to be.

Year 3402 Aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: Creepy Balls
description: Help the mysterious cat to lead the pumpkin to its final target. To do this, you need to get all the same coloured balls together to get through. The more you can get, the better. There are no limits!

name: Scavenger of Dunomini
description: A mix of match-3 and tower-defense in a post-apocalyptic setting, where you have to protect and recycle your trash-pit!

name: Witch Explorer
description:
Witch Explorer is a game which features a mix of both shoot 'em up and tower defense gameplay.
You play as the witch Tia, who is on a teasure-hunt in order to remove her debt and improve her magic shop.
The goal of the game is to defeat waves of monsters by both strategically placing units on the map, and by flying around on the map while shooting and dodging projectiles and enemies yourself.

name: God Damn the Garden
description: God Damn the Garden challenges you to face the trial of Skeleton Bastard, which tests whether or not you're worthy of becoming the next king of Badass Heaven.

name: Moonlaw
description: Moonlaw is a mini-micro-metroidvania about a heroic knight's adventure to destroy a horrible monster on the moon!

name: Love Delivery
description: This games is about starting a relationship while working delivery job!

name: Santa's Workshop
description: Help Santa grow trees and create toys for Christmas and become the biggest toy factory in the world.

name: Deluded
description: Deluded is the latest live action crime thriller game by New IDEA Games, it's an experimental fusion of narrative FMV (Full Motion Video), point and click investigation and quick time event (QTE) based interactive games. You play as a detective and try to solve a case with your the assistance of Susan.

name: Snowman Arena
description: Local multiplayer arena shooter for up to 4 players. Varied projectiles and power-ups, adjustable difficulty for each player, playing against sneaky bots to be #1 in the world leaderboard, unique maps and several game modes. For gamepads or up to 3 players on one keyboard!

name: Undestroyed
description:
For some unknown reason, an AI went rogue and annihilated humanity, and the light faded from the world.
Even the last remaining hope that is the shelter has been detected and attacked. You as an adventurer with your mechanical body must discover the forgotten technology and bring the light back to this dark world.
Undestroyed takes place in a futuristic cyberpunk world. It is a roguelike shadow-scrolling action game in which you clear one machine cell at a time in a world populated by rampaging robots.

name: Rust Raiders
description: Become a robot pirate captain in this roguelike deckbuilding game and defeat the evil Captain LeCrank. Forge cards to improve their power, augment your ship with gadgets and build your own Deck! Experience the unique card system crafted exclusively for Rust Raiders.

name: Night Attack: Touge
description: Dive into the golden era of Japanese street racing. Choose from a list of iconic cars and perfect your driving skills in beautiful mountain roads. Challenge your friends and rivals in downhill or uphill battles. At night, the streets are yours.

name: Animal Rivals: Up in the Air
description: Animal Rivals: Up In The Air is a party game with ridiculous graphics. The game will let you dive into racing courses set in the air. Invite your friends and get together into the addictive quadratic animals world!

name: Blurred Weird Night
description: Story mode combines the reasoning murderer to get the favor of female characters Multiple endings, multiple branches Form a interactive Supernatural story, The zombie mode killing monsters, different plots.

name: Antumbra: Vile Shards
description: In a nutshell: Choose Your Own Adventure, Choices Matter, Text-based, Point & Click, Exploration, Multiple Endings and Interactive Fiction. Dark and surreal psychological horror. Strongly inspired by Lovecraft, H.R. Giger and Zdzisław Beksiński.

name: Graffiti Smash
description: Slingshot to paint surfaces and get power boosts. Enjoy PvP matches via a real-time online battle system. Co-op with friends to clear dungeons and beat bosses. Enjoy a script of 1 million plus words that tells stories about the bonds and dynamics between people in a post-apocalyptic world!

name: A Turnabout On Rails
description: Welcome to A Turnabout On Rails! Fasten your seatbelts as this train will follow the track to its destination no matter the cost. Even if that destination happens to be murder...

name: Polar Bear in Space!
description: A polar bear in space must travel through a space station filled with hostile aliens, trying to collect fuel for a transporter to return home. Contains both platforming and side-scrolling shooter sections.

name: Dangerous Dave Champion's Edition
description:
The entire Dangerous Dave collection is here! From the 1988 original to the 1990 PC classic to the final 2021 remaster, all nine of Dave's adventures are here in this Champion's Edition! Here is the treasure locked within:

1988 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1990 Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
1991 Dangerous Dave in the Haunted Mansion
1991 Double Dangerous Dave
1992 Dangerous Dave Returns
1993 Dangerous Dave's Risky Rescue
1993 Dave Goes Nutz!
1995 Dangerous Dave Goes Nutz!
2021 Dangerous Dave Remaster
Pirate's Treasure Map Hint Guide for Dangerous Dave in the Deserted Pirate's Hideout
Contains BOTH Windows and MacOS versions

name: Drive Time Radio
description: Drive Time Radio is a 20 minute narrative game.

name: Vectorio: Frosted Defenses Pack
description:
Celebrate the Holidays with the new Frosted Defenses pack!
The pack includes the following cosmetics from The Armory...

- Frosted Turret skin
- Frosted Shotgunner skin
- Frosted Ranger skin
- Frosted Pulser skin
- Frosted Minigun skin
- Frosted death effect
- Frosted bullet effect

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 1C
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozy Cards
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A port of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Master System to the Commodore 64

name: Maracaibo Digital
description:
Play as an adventurer and sail around the Caribbean! Upgrade your ship, complete quests, and engage in combat. Every card you buy will unlock new abilities and bonuses to outwit your opponents.
The board changes every round, and your strategy will have to keep up. Will you play slowly, buying as many cards as you can? Or will you race to the final space to catch your opponents by surprise?

name: PengoRoyale
description: PengoRoyale is a fun, colorful, competitive, couch-brawling, battle royale! Be the last penguin standing as you fight for dominance on the ice. Grab the many power-ups and bring the smack down to 11 of your friends. Try it today!

name: Shroom and Gloom
description:
Descend into the unknown in Shroom and Gloom a first person, dungeon-crawling, deck-building tale of mushrooms and madness.

Enter The Underealm armed with nothing but a rust blade, a dying phone and a healthy appetite for roasted mushrooms. Explore your way through the depths, digging up new weapons in your quest to reach The Megashroom at all costs! Combine, grow and enchant your discoveries as you battle your way through terrifying Terry's, enchanting Bardshrooms and otherworldly Pizza Blobs!

name: Umille
description: Un prototipo, un idea di quello che potrebbe essere un RPG classico con le meccaniche di un Souls-like. Questo gioco si concentra soprattutto sulla storia che viene narrata in poche righe di dialogo e sta al giocatore capire come stanno le cose...

name: Limita Luminii
description: Joc narativ în realitate virtuală. Marcat în copilărie de trauma Primului Război Mondial, un pictor român trăiește în 1939 panica începerii unei noi tragedii, clacând treptat și evadând în spațiul abstract al propriei arte.

name: Jelle's Marble League
description: The ultimate YouTube distraction comes to life in this realistic, engaging simulation of Jelle's Marble League. Play in 16 Track and Field style events as one of 30 real world teams or build your own custom teams. Online multiplayer pits you against the world's finest marble-ists.

name: Hobo Life: Greg's Christmas
description: Someone has stolen all the crack in the city, so you team up with the Brick Guy and try to find a way to bring happiness and crack across the city once more.

name: Maimaimai Goen
description: Maimaimaigoen is a multidimensional story about the "growing pains of the heart" of 16 children and their nursery school teachers. It examines each person as an individual and accompanies them through the difficulties of living in today's world.

name: Sun In The Shade
description: Sin descripción

name: Transformation Tycoon
description: Run a small clinic that performs transformations for clients. Research new transformation techniques. Hire staff and fulfill their dreams by granting them their own transformation. Upgrade your clinic and gain fame (or infamy!) from your actions. Become the ultimate TRANSFORMATION TYCOON!

name: The Forgotten Empire
description: Now, as the Chosen One of the Empire of Atlantis, Lily must go through the most difficult challenges facing the most ferocious monsters of the Deep Sea during her journey to save Atlantis.

name: Grass Cut
description: Grass Cut is a casual puzzle game where the main objective is to place the lawn mower in the correct place to cut all the grass.

name: Epic Tower for Tireless Lovers
description: Embody an almost fairytale like princess. Housed at the top of a tower she faces an abundant amount of suitors who show up to win her over. Take the control of the princess, create your own tower, place traps and send suitors packing in this colorful and offbeat universe!

name: He Will Shoot
description: He Will Shoot - is a simple zombie killer from the third person in a variety of scenery. Choose from four arenas: a Post-Apocalyptic City, a Slum, an Industrial Zone or the Northern Mountains. Use different types of weapons to clear this place from hordes of bloodthirsty zombies.

name: Plinko Panic!
description: Plinko Panic! is a roguelike 'board-builder' about using a set of pinballs and a pachinko board in order to delve through dungeons and defeat numerous enemies. Buy a new pinball at the end of each round and see just how far you can get!

name: Mia's Christmas
description: Join Mia this Christmas as she prepares to decorate her flat in this deceptively simple yet increasingly difficult puzzle game.

name: Welcome to the Adamant Maintenance Monitoring Terminal
description:
> the heating again?

Year 3174 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: Medieval Trader Simulator
description: A manager simulation for a medieval trader life.

name: The Two of Us
description: The Two of Us is a 2D Co-op Platformer that has a strong emphasis on working together. You will be greeted with various puzzle levels where you must work in conjunction with your friend to navigate the level. The game is complete with 2D Animations, Sound Effects and PvE Combat.

name: Shot2048
description: Shot2048 is a puzzle game developed as a solo project by veteran game designer Yuji Naka. It riffs on games like 2048 and its ilk with a dice shooting twist, combining mastery of the physics engine with strategic placement, and ricocheting, of the dice to increase your score.

name: Another Day in Paradise
description: Play with 5 characters, find the clues and reveal the mystery of that October 24th. You will explore the places and survive terrifying rituals, the astral world is waiting for you. A story that mixes adventure and terror in equal parts.

name: Baba Yaga
description: Enter the dark mysterious forest of the witch to look for your missing child. Search for answers to help you uncover the truth of the village mystery and the horrors of Baba Yaga.

name: Ochitsubaki
description: OCHITSUBAKI is a bilingual JPN/ENG transgender fantasy visual novel with an experimental poetic storytelling structure, a retro anime aesthetic, and a lush original orchestral soundtrack

name: Fish Love Danger
description: A cute arcade game about a fish in love.

name: Vrkshop
description: Vrkshop is a VR woodworking game. You are challenged to build projects with hand tools without snap-to-guides or limits on how to cut or fasten the lumber. The precision of your project is left entirely up to you. Have fun. Be productive.

name: Lobi y la Caza del Tesoro
description: Sin descripción

name: Chill Corner: Extras
description:
This DLC added new characters (included outfits) and pets
- New male character Victor with two outfit
- New female character Emillia with three outfit
- New variants of Cat and Dog
- New exclusive decorator
- New room

name: The Door
description: "The Door" is a suspense-solving electronic interactive novel that tells the story of a murderer seeking the truth and praying for relief.

name: The Hot Tog II
description: Sin descripción

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Zealot Pack
description:
Bring out the fear in the eyes of your enemies with the Zealot Pack - an ultimate set dedicated to worshippers in need of extra style and experience!

This pack includes :
An Epic Dragon Skin for the Windguard
An Epic Dragon Skin for the Marauder
2,000 Gems
A full epic outfit for the Phantom
A Legendary helmet for the Windguard
A Legendary helmet for the Marauder
An Epic weapon for the Windguard
An Epic weapon for the Marauder
A 14-day xp booster
2 banners, player titles, profile wallpapers and player icons

name: Cosmic Commute
description: Cosmic Commute is a surreal space comedy set in a world stranger than fiction: the public transport system. Playing as everyone's least favourite discount cop - a ticket inspector - discover that even unfathomable creatures have relatable problems.

name: Ninja Froggies
description:
Ninja Froggies is a tower defense game in which you help the little Froggies to defend their pond against the Fishies that try to evade it and snacc their Tadpoles!

With a variety of brave warriors you can build up a strong army of Froggies to fight the waves of enemies approaching. Each Froggy has their own unique power or effect that either serve to fight head on or help others by increasing certain stats.

name: Knights & Guns: Expansion Pack #1
description:
The village is under threat again, will you take up the challenge, Sir Gunsalot?
This DLC includes:
- 10 new levels for you to bring back the peace
- Five new armors to help you on your quest
- New enemies for that extra little kick

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Free heartwarming Jigsaw Puzzles. Enjoy relaxing atmosphere with this incredible HD Jigsaws. Become the Master of Pieces!

name: Nuclear Empire
description: Mine energy and become a nuclear tycoon.

name: Cow Girls
description: You just want to buy milk, but fate loves to slip adventures where you don't expect it. On the farm, you will meet a milkmaid who will make you play the game by her rules. Play the puzzle with the milkmaid. This is the only way you can get her milk.

name: Ice Cream Break: Head to Head
description: Ice Cream Break: Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated Ice Cream themed items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Panic Factory
description: A group of environmental activists have entered the industrial complex of the infamous Dr Paiipozz and his monstrous mutants. Will you escape from the Panic Factory alive?

name: Learning Life: Mysteeri 24/7
description: Mysteeri 24/7 is an immersive escape game for vocational rehabilitation and youth work. The game is a single-player game with linear gameplay. The game is well suited for all professionals who work with young people, for example in vocational rehabilitation, vocational education and youth work.

name: Zaccaria Pinball: Postal Redux Pinball Pack
description: The official POSTAL Redux Pinball Pack. Flip through the Dude's universe in these 4 unique tables. All in-game content is authentic, featuring materials and assets from the original PC hit!

name: Cinemoji: Series
description: Are you a series marathoner? This game is for you! Test your deduction skills and your knowledge trying to guess the name of the series represented by the emojis!

name: Slobbish Dragon Princess 2
description: Takeru and Haru's life of slacc is upended once more as Iris, dragon queen of the Sea and Water factions shows up on Earth to claim the seas and bar all humans from entering them. Hijinks and plenty of dragon girls await in Slobbish Dragon Princess 2!

name: Endless War
description: "Endless war" is a third person shooting game, which controls tanks to experience the feeling of fighting on the battlefield!

name: Mines of Frostheim
description: Explore the deep depths of this randomly generated mine! This dungeon crawler features over 100+ diverse monsters to fight and hundreds of treasures to collect as you help the Guilds discover the secrets of the mine.

name: Battle Heroine Crisis
description: [If you can control the hearts of others... What would you do?]A new concept of card battle + scenario adventure game!What do you want to be with her? Friends? Lovers? or...

name: Hyperjustice
description: HyperJustice is a fast-paced third-person shooter inspired by 1980’s cop movies and television. Sprint through neon-stained Miami as you battle the mob and try to prevent the distribution of a world-ending drug.

name: Atelier Agnes
description: Agnes, a girl living will her ill sister, meets her master of alchemy, Bell Faris for the first time in 7 years. She makes up her mind to become a mature alchemist when Bell indicates about the recovery of her sister. But Bell was planning to utilize Agnes's kind character to repay her debt...

name: Catherine Ragnor and the Legend of the Flying Dutchman
description: After falling victim to a curse, Captain Hendrick van der Decken of the Flying Dutchman is doomed to sail the seas for eternity. However, a chance encounter with another cursed pirate shows him a chance to find salvation. Play this thrilling Match3 adventure and help Captain van Decken.

name: Chesskoban Bishop
description: Relaxing puzzle game for chess lovers and beginners using a combination of sokoban and chess mechanics. Capture enemy bishops to complete levels.

name: Cold Verdict
description: Five strangers wake up in a dark room in an abandoned building with no idea who put them there and why. They now need to work together in order to figure out what connects them and how to get out of this place. A short psychological thriller visual novel with choices.

name: Acid Trip
description: Acid Trip is a 2d top-down shooter you can play it with raw brutality, hard-boiled gunplay, and Back-Breaking, Challenging Gameplay defeat bosses, zombies, and don't die from shredders, traps to make it more hellish and brutal. it's like if doom was 2d.

name: Among Waifus 18+
description: Among Waifus 18+ is a casual game with original puzzle mechanics based on runners. To experience the whole journey with these sexy girls you have to win a variety of levels by finding the escape of levels.

name: Summer in Mara + Deiland Bundle
description: Experience the entire Chibig Universe with this bundle that includes Summer in Mara and Deiland.

name: Crust Crusaders
description:
Crust Crusaders is a unique shoot 'em up roguelike. The toppings you select effect your abilities. For example, pepperoni gives you a double blaster, while mushrooms give you a shield. Not one playthrough will be the same. Are you ready to defeat the evil veggies and save the planetary pie?
Crust Crusaders uses an auto-rotate feature that allows the player to enjoy the game by only using one touch!

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Beyond a Joke
description: Race to outsmart a daring opponent who targets only rich people.

name: Far Cry 6: Danny & Dani Vs. Everybody
description: “Danny & Dani vs. Everybody” is a new Yaran story where “players will need to prevent Antón Castillo’s forces from blowing up Danny’s plan to come to Yara to make his world-famous tasty tacos to feed the hungry.” Then, in The sixth and final Special Operation, “Malagua”, “Trejo returns a favor by joining players to help students protesting the Antón’s military – who is deploying the chemical weapon (PG-240X) in Yara.” Players also get access to the Danny Trejo Bundle, which includes themed gear, Trejo’s signature outfit, and the taco truck from the missions.

name: My Adventures Checking Out "Animals of the World: The Adventures of Civette the Space-Faring Civet"
description:
Year 3112 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

The best book in the whole library.

name: Christmas Massacre
description: Larry's Christmas tree has been telling him to kill. But whose side is the tree really on? And can he trust what he's hearing? CHRISTMAS MASSACRE is an 80's inspired stealth slasher game with low-poly, PS1-style graphics. Sneak, stalk and murder your prey without being caught. You must kill without being seen to complete each level.

name: Chameneon
description:
Run, jump and dodge! Chameneon is a 2D Runner with unique physics that create a great challenge!

Switch the neon colors and surf your way to the end. A powerful virus has infected the Cyber Space and now is up to you to control a manual message called CHAMENEON.

Collect the Neon Disks to show everyone who's boss. With simple gameplay and tons of stages to go throgh, you will be tested to the limit!

So what are you waiting for? It's your time to shiny!

name: Crazy Zen Codeword
description: It's codeword! The classic pen and paper puzzle. In this translation from paper to screen, animated highlights make it is easier to read the state of the board and autofill makes it much quicker to try out different letter combinations. Simply use the letter picker to fill in the grey blanks and find as many words as you can to complete the board! Remember that every letter used can only be used once, so choose wisely. Crazy Zen Codeword. For the wordsmiths, English Language enthusiasts, and boredom fighters alike!

name: Elevator
description: Inspired by games like The Stanley Parable and Portal 2 you have to find your way through a creepy building, locked doors, an uncooperative elevator and challenging puzzles to get to your job interview on the top floor in this uncanny adventure game!

name: Brutal Orchestra
description: Brutal Orchestra is a turn-based roguelike strategy game. You died, someone killed you. You are now in Purgatory and you will never escape. Make a deal with the "demon" Bosch and set off into this bastardous world finding ​all manner of demented friends and foes on your quest to get petty revenge.

name: Bouncy Bunnies
description: Race against your friends in a colorful platform world. Take the boost to run faster or find the shortest path to be the first bunny to reach the goal. Choose between 8 different levels. Collect carrots to get higher score!

name: Disney Melee Mania
description: Disney Melee Mania is a 3v3 arena brawler video game featuring Disney and Pixar characters. Each champion will appear in a distinct action-ready design equipped with their own set of iconic moves and unlockable

name: Him & Her 3
description: Help the cutest video game couple to meet once again. A puzzle platformer with an unique gameplay mechanic. Only love can win in the end.

name: Chill Corner
description: This is just an idle game for chillout and relaxing.

name: Aspire: Ina's Tale
description: Aspire: Ina's Tale is a 2D, adventure puzzle game. Set out on a fantastical adventure as Ina and take a journey of self-discovery against the backdrop of dazzling, mystical landscapes of The Tower. Experience her fear turn to conviction as she unravels her purpose in this world and embarks on a one-way path to freedom.

name: Crown Trick: Special Edition
description:
CrownTrick is a procedurally generated maze game with Roguelike gameplay and hand drawn art style. Take up the unbelievable crown and start your underground adventure with the power...

Crown Trick: Special Edition includes:

- Base Game
- Collector's Box
- Original Soundtrack
- 10 Postcards of characters from the game
- Contains access to "Requiem of Elements" DLC

name: SimplePlanes VR
description:
Strap a VR headset on your face and fly fighter jets, bombers, helicopters, WW2 planes, civilian planes, race cars, monster trucks, tanks, and pretty much anything else you can think of. There are over half a million crafts available to download for free.

SimplePlanes VR is a flight sim with an ever-expanding collection of aircraft to download and fly for free. Airplanes, helicopters, cars, boats, and more are available and new crafts are added every day.

name: Innocent Girl
description: Great game modes, consisting of a different of nice games with innocent girls. Exiting atmosphere, great SFX, levels with beautiful artworks.

name: Provider
description: Speak to the lost souls, caught between planes and lacking closure. Brave the dangerous Excluded Zones. Return victorious, with a story to tell. Provide closure and uncover the larger mystery that lurks.

name: Miss Neko 2
description: Welcome to the magic island — Nekoland! All good things you want will happen here! Solve the match puzzles, collect the magic coins and then you will see miracles!

name: Quickie: A Love Hotel Story
