description: Quickie: A Love Hotel Story is an erotic management dating-sim where you manage a love hotel and develop romantic relationships in the city of Tokyo.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals
description: Old-school dungeon crawler is here ! This game is most old-school style of "Wizardry" spiritual successor, which gave origin of JRPGs, is now available on Steam with scenario editor and some modern UI improvements.

name: Motor Town: Behind the Wheel
description: Enjoy realistic driving in the open world. Relaxing cargo deliveries or driving buses and taxes will give you enough money to buy new cars and parts. You can test your driving skills at the race track. It's all about pure driving pleasure!

name: AdventureQuest 8-Bit: Dungeons & DoomKnights
description: The AdventureQuest franchise reimagined as a NES game. Funded on Kickstarter in 2019, this "Zeldavania" released on the Nintendo Entertainment System in 2021.

name: Fit Fantasy
description: A dating sim inspired by 4chan's /fit/ board.

name: Sky Fleet
description: Take to the skies as part of the Sky Fleet, defend sacred floating islands, build strong bases and towers to protect their resources, as well as shoot down waves of rogue drones trying to strip-mine them!

name: Arena of Kings
description: Arena of Kings is a fast-paced, competitive online arena game. Experience MMORPG-style combat without the grind. Create a hero from 10 unique classes. Level up, learn new spells, and collect epic loot. Casual, Ranked, and Tournament game modes. Play for free on Steam!

name: Ice League Hockey
description: Grab your sticks and face off at center ice in Koality Game's Ice League Hockey! Choose a league, select a team and lead your players to the Cup. Get charged with a penalty for fighting and test your defense. Or attack on a power play and use your passing skills to catch your opponents off guard. Either way, you can become the next dynasty in the hottest hockey game on ice. This is the Ice League.

name: Ice Scream 6 Friends: Charlie
description:
Charlie explores the kitchen to join his friends.
In the previous chapter J. collaborated with Mike to help him escape from the engine room and meet in the control room. However, there are still 2 friends to rescue, and it seems they have already found the next one, this time inside the factory’s kitchen.
In this new installment you will play as Charlie, who is still lost in the factory and who, with J.'s help, will have to face all the dangers that await him inside the factory. Switch players and go back to being J. whenever you need to. Explore the new parts of the factory in this chapter, meet the new Super Robot in charge of the kitchen, and take on the Mini-Rods and the ice-cream man to get the friends back together.

name: Flying Wings HoverCraft
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels: Holiday Season Customization Pack
description: Get into the festive mood with the special Holiday Season Customization Pack: 8 fantastic elements for your Basement and 3 for your Unleashed profile. Get ready to unpack victory after victory in your new Christmassy room!

name: Armored Warfare: Falcon General Pack
description: General’s Bundle: Falcon

name: Dying Light: Snow Ops Bundle
description: Level up selected skill trees faster with the special outfit, and use the new grenade launcher to freeze your enemies!

name: Deathsmiles I & II: Gothic wa Mahou Otome 5 Characters
description: Deathsmiles meets Gothic wa Mahou Otome

name: Call of Antia
description: Call of Antia is a brand new type of match-3 RPG game. In this unique RPG game, the classic match-3 puzzle will be used to inspire the potential of the dragons and heroes as they charge into the enemies fearlessly. Are you ready? Let's reveal the secret of Antia!

name: Alien: Isolation
description: Engage in a terrifying quest for survival as you navigate the labyrinthine Sevastopol station. Unprepared and underequipped, you will need all your wits and daring to get out alive.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Shangri-La
description: The second installment of our Lost Cities series of courses takes you to Shangri-La. Make your way through a maze of bridges, soar over chasms, and collect even more lost balls! This DLC also includes a night mode version of the course with tougher holes and an all new foxhunt to solve!

name: Blast Waves
description:
Blast Waves is a tactical arcade shooter where time only moves as you move, and every shot counts.
Play through the rogue-like Survival Mode as a fresh recruit. Rapidly gain new weapons and abilities while trying to make it through an intergalactic conflict.
Most troopers won't make it. The few that do survive become permanently playable as clone squad commanders. In the auto battler-like Command Mode, players build and organize squads while fighting to last as long as possible against overwhelming odds.

name: Echoes
description: Fears are not always just rustles in the dark. And death is not always a bad ending.

name: Trials of Proelium
description: Experience a colorful world full of vibrant characters through the eyes of Letha, a young warrior on the hunt for district masters in her pursuit to become Proeliums new emperor in this anime style turn-based RPG.

name: Mining Cats
description: Mining Cats is a logic puzzle that involves blasting rocks and creating paths that connect mines of gemstones of the same color.

name: Trails of Gold Privateers
description: With Trails Of Gold Privateers, you're ready to awake the corsair in you!

name: Search All: Seashells
description: Is a game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you need to find all the seashells on a large location drawn in the style of "doodling"

name: Chibi Girl vs. Evil Zombie Dead
description: Suddenly there was a zombie apocalypse. All the adults turned into zombies! Chibi Girl is looking for her mother and tries to save the world.

name: Amelie
description: A psychological mystery yuri visual novel about a girl named Amelie. Forbidden from leaving the house, Amelie awaits the arrival of her long time penpal, Sofia, to her dear friend Lilika’s dismay. What secrets will Sofia unravel that were best kept buried?

name: Far Cry 3: Blood Dragon - Classic Edition
description: Far Cry 3 Blood Dragon Classic Edition is THE 80's-style sci-fi cyber shooter, taking place on a bizarre open world island crawling with evil - now on the current generation of consoles.

name: VRock
description: VRock is a unique Virtual Reality experience that allows you to experience what it is like to be part of a rock band with music created especially for the title. Being able to choose between different instruments, you have to manage to complete the songs and achieve the success you deserve. As you beat levels, you will evolve in your style and play to larger audiences in larger venues. VRock is a unique experience, it is easy to learn to play each of the instruments and fun to master them. Also, there are a ton of songs to play with in the base game.

name: Bald Luigi's Crustmust Deluxe
description:
Take a look into the history of Ralorche, the creator of Essence Of Waluigi with the definitive way to play his last Joke Game, Bald Luigi's Crustmust.

In Bald Luigi's Crustmust: Christmas has been canceled (for a basically obvious reason) and Santario, the biggest christmas fanboy is livid! He plans to kill literally everyone! As Bald Luigi, it is up to you to stop him, but little do you know that there is something strange going on behind the scenes......

name: Jewelinx
description: The second installment in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! A retro-style Falling block puzzle!!

name: Oumuamua
description: The third installment in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! Retro-style Breakout clone!

name: Cham the Cat Adventure
description: The first in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! Dedicated to the game boys and girls of the past. A retro-style action game!

name: Dinosaur Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Unique dinosaur game for children. Perfect for all dinosaur fans.

name: Love Pop!
description: Draw lines on the screen to send love and kisses to your neighbors. Guide the heart through more than 100 levels full of obstacles and evil neighbors who will want to keep your love. And this is not the only thing! On your way you will find other caged hearts waiting to be rescued so you can play with them. Let love be unleashed in the neighborhood!

name: Murder Diaries 3: Santa's Trail of Blood
description: In this game you abstractly follow the narration of a young man who slowly but surely becomes insane. This leads you straight into the middle of an exciting murder case and a murder mystery unfolds while you listen to the testimonies of witness, friends and relatives. The whole game is somewhat Christmas flavored - however, don't get yourself comfortable, the game not going to give you a nice and warm feeling but rather confront you with a cold and harsh reality as the thrilling storytelling of the game will leave you with a cold shiver down your spine. The game is a must have for any true fan of thrillers and anyone how enjoys a murder mystery that goes beyond the normal story telling. How does the gameplay work? You will play as a free-floating ghost like creature. Basically, as the soul of someone who is experiencing the story. You are very small in comparison to the surroundings and can fly freely through the area. You start by exploring the area and enjoying the feeling of flying as well as the gentle yet mysterious background music. Soon after starting to explore, you will find the first memory piece. You can collect the memory pieces to continue with the story and to advance with the overall narration. The story talks about a young boy, about his live and about how everything changes. It is setup as a thrilling murder mystery and acts as a contrast to the somewhat calm and enjoyable gameplay.

name: Escape from Mirrorland: The Adventures of Nyanzou & Kumakichi - Escape Game Series
description: Nyanzou always makes a mess of things. Today, he’s up to something in front of the mirror. When Kumakichi asks him what he’s doing, he says he’s facing two mirrors in front of one another. It’s not midnight but noon right now, but will it still work?  As usual, Nyanzou messes up and gets trapped in Mirrorland. Help him escape. It's your standard escape game, on the easy side, and highly recommended for beginners. It comes with autosave, hints, and memo functions.

name: Cape's Escape Game 5th Room
description: Cape's Escape Game 5th Room is a short adventure game in the Cape's Escape series, which you can complete in an hour or so. Solve the mystery and breakout from the escape game of Cape's dreams.

name: Arcade Archives: Mirai Ninja
description: Mirai Ninja is an action game released by Namco in 1988. Control the cyborg ninja, Shiranui, and rescue Princess Saki from the cyborg ninja army that kidnapped her. Pick up the orbs in the stages to activate various effects that will help Shiranui.

name: Moonbound
description: Moonbound is a challenging 2D arcade action game that forces the player to make quick decisions under pressure. The player controls an astronaut who is returning to Earth after completing a geological survey mission in the Beta Iridian solar system. The astronaut's ship is suddenly damaged by an explosion! The energy crystals that are used as the ship's main power source are ejected out of the ship and land on six different moons. The player must return all of the remaining crystals to the ship to be able to return to Earth.

name: Astatos
description: Leave your influence in your wake as you bring together a broken land in a card-battling adventure filled with gods, heroes, and the instability of yourself and those around you. Play the story, or go online with fellow Crown Mages for tabletop card action.

name: Celerity
description: Celerity is a fast-paced, first person parkour game. Use Wall Running, Grappling Hooks, Hookshots and many more, chain your moves and never lose momentum.

name: Holy Moly
description: Sin descripción

name: International Basketball Manager 22
description: Become the best basketball coach of the moment with International Basketball Manager 2022. Take your team to the pinnacle of the sport by managing all its day-to-day affairs with the seemingly endless array of management tools that the game offers you. Your team’s results will depend on you. Can you handle the pressure?

name: ForeVR Darts
description: Experience Oculus’ latest Hand Tracking technology in the perfect game to play with your hands: darts! Stock your arsenal with a selection of 50+ uniquely weighted darts with custom effects and attributes, featuring a range of classic designs and fantastical flights. Explore 3 immersive darts halls and choose from 1000s of songs on the jukebox or stay tuned into each hall’s curated playlist. Get competitive with Double Out (501, 301) in public multiplayer or keep it casual with 501, 301, 201, and 101 modes in Single Player, Pass-and-Play, or a Private room with friends. Create or join public or private multiplayer rooms to face off against players all around the world. Create private multiplayer rooms to play against friends and family online or use Pass-and-Play to play with one headset locally. Prefer to play solo? Challenge in-game pro NPCs to hone your skills and level up. ForeVR Darts gets players’ hands-on VR like no other sports game can!

name: Match Three Pirates II
description: Enjoy the great Match 3 Pirate Adventure. Form groups of three or more crabs, canons, steering wheels, explosives and other pirate items to unlock powerful boosters and complete all level goals. Use the right strategy, earn coins and build your own great theme park on Pirate Island.

name: Mon Bazou
description: Build your crappy vehicle into a race car, install the parts yourself. Make money by cutting wood, racing at night or delivering pizza. Maybe you want to manage a sugar shack or build yourself a big garage?

name: Queue Simulator
description: Queue simulator brings you your favorite part of MMORPG experience - waiting in Queue!

name: Pui Pui Molcar Let's! Molcar Party!
description:
Welcome to a brand-new town, Moltown! Only you and the Molcars can transform this barren burg into a bustling urban hub. And with that...let's party!

With 10 exciting minigames, that is! What's more, sharing Joy-Con controllers allows for up to 4 players at once.

Play alone or with friends—the wide world of Molcars beckons you!

Minigames: An exciting array of minigames awaits! Includes scenes from the show!

Step into the Molcar world with a medley of fun minigames spanning all genres! Throw a party, dance, even play soccer—cops and robbers too!

name: Tower of Fantasy
description:
Tower of Fantasy is an anime-inspired cross-platform Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG) available on Mobile, PC and PlayStation. The MMORPG features a large open world, sci-fi themed Anime aesthetics, fast, smooth action combat, the ability to interact with your environment, an active PvP system and so much more.

Immersive Open-World
Experience a vast alien world full of beautiful open vistas and imposing futuristic structures.

Unique Characters
Wield the unique weapons of each character that grant different gameplay styles as you explore their compelling backstories.

Grow and Explore Together
Party up with friends online and take on new adventures in the shared open world.

Epic Combat
Engage in epic battles against enemies of all shapes and sizes as you switch weapons and gameplay styles on the fly to unlock your own personal fighting style.

Explore and Interact
Explore and interact with a vibrant living world as you discover your own journey through it.

name: Deathsmiles I & II: Gothic wa Mahou Otome Love Max Edition
description:
The Gothic wa Mahou Otome Love Max Edition includes:
・ Game software for PS4 "Death Smiles I / II" (special edition: OST CD + Special DLC )
・ B2 tapestry drawn by Dr. Junya Inoue
・ "Death Smiles" original acrylic panel
・ "Jill Ballard" A4 microfiber towel

name: Three Pigeons in a Trench Coat
description: A game about Three Pigeons in a Trench Coat stuck in a time loop until they save the world. Pretty Simple.

name: Kemco RPG Selection Vol. 8
description: The 8th volume includes Armed Emeth, Crystal Ortha, Justice Chronicles, and Monster Viator.

name: The Tragedy of Little Joy
description: The Tragedy of little Joy is a hand-built hardcore platformer combined with a deep and emotional story. Experience a dream full of memories and fears, overcome dangerous obstacles and explore complex characters.

name: The Whisperer
description: Explore an abandoned trading post and solve a complex puzzle to investigate the terrible secret it holds. The Whisperer is a short story-driven point & click game set in Lower Canada at the beginning of the 19th century.

name: Milk outside a bag of milk outside a bag of milk
description: A sequel to Milk inside a bag of milk inside a bag of milk. Dive into demented and bizarre world once again and help the girl become a little happier.

name: Against
description: Against is a combat rhythm VR game that will immerse you in a noir crime nightmare. Follow the beat to shoot and slice your way through Mafioso forces. Empowering modern music is your only way out from the bleak streets of 1930's New York.

name: Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo
description:
Can you trust your own mind? In Alfred Hitchcock: Vertigo, dive into a new kind of psychological thriller, and walk on a thin line between reality and fantasy.

Live a powerful narrative experience paying tribute to the visual and storytelling techniques of the thriller genre. Investigate through the vision of three characters: everyone has a different story to tell. Explore several timelines to cross-check the events and separate reality from deceptive memories. Prepare yourself for a disturbing investigation inside the human mind: the truth is sometimes worse than madness…

name: Oxygen Not Included: Spaced Out!
description:
In Oxygen Not Included: Spaced Out! you'll spearhead space missions to new and undiscovered Planetoids, transport resources between bases, and manage multiple worlds on the fly to build a megacolony that not only survives, but hopefully, thrives.

New Multi-World Gameplay:
Put your colony management skills to the test by juggling the needs of Duplicants in multiple colonies simultaneously. Switch between planets in real time and secure rare resources on other worlds to supply your home base.

Expanded Rocketry:
Customize new modular rockets to your liking, then explore the expanse of space with the newly overhauled Starmap. Huge expansions to the Research Tree provide new mid-game Rocketry options, giving your Duplicants an edge in the asteroid space-race.

New Critters:
Get acquainted with some new fuzzy friends - if you're nice, they might help you out around the colony!

New Resources, Biomes, Tech and More:
Tons of new biomes to explore, tech to research, and resources to mine. There's a whole new universe out there - discover it all in Oxygen Not Included: Spaced Out!

name: Deathsmiles I & II
description:
Deathsmiles
Enter the world of Gilverado, a kingdom plagued by hideous monsters and tortured souls. Choose from four angels with unique demonic familiars and battle against a storm of enemies pouring out of Hell’s gates! Fight your way out of tight spots as you are surrounded by enemy units and bullets from both sides of the screen. The unique left/right shooting mechanic of Deathsmiles will keep you on your toes as you dodge and weave through complex enemy fire, beautifully crafted by the modern masters of shmups, CAVE.

DeathSmiles II X
"DeathSmiles" comes back as "DeathSmiles II X"! This time it takes place at Christmas. Angels fight at snowing Gilverado. "DeathSmiles II X" is a sequel to the Horizontal side-scrolling STG "DeathSmiles".

name: Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach
description: Five Nights at Freddy’s: Security Breach is the latest installment of the family-friendly horror games loved by millions of players from all over the globe. Play as Gregory, a young boy trapped overnight in Freddy Fazbear's Mega Pizzaplex. With the help of Freddy Fazbear himself, Gregory must survive the near-unstoppable hunt of reimagined Five Nights at Freddy’s characters, as well as new, horrific threats.

name: The Gunk
description: The Gunk is an adventure game that stars Rani, one part of our duo of gritty space haulers, struggling to make a buck as they chance upon an untouched planet brimming with life. They came in search of valuable resources, and it looks like they've hit the jackpot...

name: Karma City Police
description: Be the new dispatcher at the Karma City Police Station in this narrative-driven pixel adventure. Talk to the victims to discover their needs and fight in a unique pinball-based battle system, as you follow a captivating story with lots of humor and a great soundtrack.

name: Ouritsu Anapoko Gakuen
description:
Ouritsu Anapoko Gakuen is a scenario-style RPG following adventuring students over the course of three years before they graduate the academy.

Royal Anapoko Academy sees players controlling a four-person party a seamlessly transitioning between exploration and combat. Players need to strategically use skills that hinder enemies, taking advantage of access to a special command that lets them see the enemies’ upcoming actions.

name: OlliOlli World: Expansion Pass
description: Continue your quest for Gnarvana. OlliOlli World’s Expansion Pass includes two narrative expansions bundled at a discount.

name: For the Birds VI
description: Sin descripción

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS. EX
description: Sin descripción

name: Things.smc
description: Sin descripción

name: 2048 3D
description: Control cubes and enjoy 2048 game in real 3D world! Be careful not to drop the cube outside the box!

name: A One Rabbit Open Slay
description:
A One Rabbit Open Slay is a single Boom map for Doom 2 (MAP01) using the OTEX texture pack as a base. The wad does utilize UMAPINFO, so you will need to run it in a port that supports the format. MAPINFO and a few other enhancements were made for GZDoom as well, so that can also be used. PrBoom+ UM, Woof!, DSDA Doom, and GZDoom were used for testing.

The main objective here is slightly different in that you need to deliver presents to three Christmas trees located throughout the map. Press the "use" key next to one of these trees to drop off the gifts. Once they have all been delivered, return to your sleigh!

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds - Hunting Party DLC Bundle 3
description: Become an elite hunter with three new Predator premium classes with this DLC bundle featuring the Scar Predator, Chopper Predator, and Celtic Predator premium classes.

name: Scarlet Nexus: Bond Enhancement Pack 2
description:
The SCARLET NEXUS Bond Enhancement Pack 2 DLC contains additional costume and weapon sets for all characters with new designs by external creators.

The pack also includes new Bond Episodes, new SAS abilities gained from Bond Level Expansion (Bond Level EX), and ways to enjoy new sides to your favorite characters that you didn’t see in the main game!

name: Warframe: The New War - Reckoning Pack
description: For a limited time, instantly add two Warframe Skins, Weapons, Customizations, Boosters and more to your Arsenal to repel the Sentient invasion and fight The New War! Evolve your look with new Protovyre gear, which will unlock additional Customizations as you play.

name: Golden Axe III Redux
description: Sin descripción

name: Grin Robot Games Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Synchro Hedgehogs Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Chrono Circle
description: Sin descripción

name: Tanks vs Tanks: PvP
description: Tanks vs Tanks: PvP is a local tank battle simulator game where you try to destroy as many enemy tanks as possible. Combat your enemy with unlimited but time-based bullets. Pay attention to your health and don’t forget to collect extra health. This is your only way of success in this war gaming.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Contract
description: Grand Theft Auto Online: The Contract sends gamers on a crazy quest to find fresh and exclusive recordings from Dr. Dre, the Grammy-winning hip-hop legend. Featuring guest artists such as Anderson.Paak, Eminem, Busta Rhymes, Snoop Dogg, Nipsey Hussle, Ty Dolla $ign, and others, gaining access to these songs is seamlessly woven into the experience of each story mission and part of the reward for helping Franklin and his friends make their new agency a success.

name: Battery Low
description:
Tap on time to charge your phone and deliver it to the charge point like a flip master! It's a perfect time to save the low battery and your phone too!

The Mobile phone is out of battery, and you have a zillion ways to put it on the charger! Just tap on time and aim at the target!

Make a clear strategy before you make your move, you don't want to break your phone while trying to do a home flip!

name: Pleasurepunk: Drug Dealer
description: In Pleasurepunk: Drug Dealer you are a hacker trying to find compromised photos of a drug dealer wanted by the FBI. Destroy the blocks and see the most hot pics of her.

name: Lug's Delightful Dioramas
description: Lug's Delightful Dioramas is a ROM hack/mod of Super Mario 64 which creates a new genre in the hacking scene of the game, the "diorama", where every level is as small and efficient as possible.

name: Lonely Mountains: Downhill - Riley's Return
description: Ride into uncharted territory and discover the lost trail of Mount Riley in this free DLC. Prove your skills in new challenges to unlock the brand-new earth elemental customization set Riley’s Return brings you a fresh adventure to the Lonely Mountains.

name: LIP! Lewd Idol Project Vol.1: Hot Springs and Beach Episodes
description: It’s the ultimate fanservice experience! A 2-in-1 yuri lewd adventure featuring Kairi and Ranko from LIP! Lewd Idol Project on a relaxing trip to the hot springs, and a hot visit to the beach! Join the fun and enjoy your day off while having a lot of girl-on-girl action! Are you gonna miss it?

name: Sucker for Love: Prelude
description: Perform a series of scary rituals to win over an eldritch cutie and win a smooch!

name: Sub-Uber-Marine
description:
In Sub-Uber-Marine you are a sub-aquatic taxi driver. Deep-sea divers need your help getting around the ocean!
•Three different game modes: Arcade, Day Shift and Night Shift. In Arcade mode, complete as many fares as you can, each fare adds more time, like a certain taxi-based game by a very litigious company. In Day Shift, complete as many fares as you can in 8 minutes. In Night Shift, there are 20 divers scattered about the ocean, complete the fares as fast as possible.

name: Block City: Bus Edition
description: Push some blocks, run away from the fight (or not), respect the older blocks and be careful with the bad guys, all this on the bus in bustling Block City!

name: Do Something
description: After a few hours of epidemic, you go straight to the center to find a secret descent to the laboratory and destroy the virus...

name: Murder of the Bear lake
description: In Murder of the Bear lake You go to explore the dark forest and the Bear lake you find some people and you talk with them and do some quest for them.

name: Scratch Girl
description: Control the spaceship to find the beauty! Start a journey of conversation with the beauty!

name: Phantasia
description: This is a fantasy, interactive novel experience.

name: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate: Christmas 3
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: Aeterna Noctis: Caos Edition
description:
This edition includes the following PS4 Game:
- Aeterna Noctis
- Steelbook
- Collector's Edition Art Book
- Collector's CD Cover
- Original Soundtrack 3 CD's
- Glass Postcards 2 Models
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Key: Maze of Illusions
description:
Key: Maze of Illusions is one of those action platform games that gets the player hooked on rage and the thirst to overcome all obstacles in their path. In this adventure, you are Zeno, a green creature who has been left in a dangerous dungeon filled with rooms full of enemies and cruel traps.

But how did he get there? His family was attacked, and where are they now? What really happened? Answering these questions and taking revenge on the person responsible for this tragedy is part of his goals. And most importantly: to find the keys to every room in the dungeon, for only then will Zeno be closer to knowing the whole truth.

name: Childlike
description: Use objects not to step on the floor. Do not step on the road outside. Run away from the Guard at school. Run away from the haunted doll.

name: Calamity Eliminator
description: Calamity Eliminator is an anime-styled roguelike single-player deck-building game.You play as a member of the Existence Management Company, using the Calamity Eliminator to lead pioneers and Valkyries to save the day on a planet that has been struck by disaster.

name: Cute Dogs
description: Is it possible to buy some happiness with money? Who knows, but you can buy yourself a dog! Look, how cute they are! Play with our fluffy little fellas, a «find-differences» game. These cute little puppies can help you relax and find some peace of mind.

name: Unmetaverse
description: Have you ever tried VRSNS but quit because you couldn't get used to the community? Unmetaverse is a VRSNS for people who have no friends. No voice chat, open world MMO space with content that you can enjoy alone.

name: Aussie Clowns At War
description: Aussie Clowns At War Dec 15, 2021 a free humorous fast paced multiplayer pc fps war shooter with some favored old school qualities like "COD MW2 kil streak announcer and Vietcong CTF" & 5 game modes 20 maps, awsome weapons classes including flame thrower, easy secure player hosting.

name: Richard West and the Golden Mask
description: Help Richard West to find the Golden Mask in this adventure game, fulfilled with dangerous traps, mysteries and puzzles to solve. Use your skills to overcome obstacles and reach your goal.

name: Bumballon
description: Join the cute Bumballon on this frantic journey into a colorful world full of dangers! Fast, fun and with an ability to control your super speed. Collect all the magic emeralds to complete each level and discover new mechanics throughout the adventure.

name: One Line
description: One Line is a minimalist puzzle game where the objective is to draw a single line filling the entire board. Different mechanics will challenge your mind in this game that is easy to learn but hard to solve. Can you find the correct path?

name: Diefrosty
description: Diefrosty is an unsurvival puzzle game, where your one and only goal is to kill your ice-cuby character no matter how. Intereract with many obstacles, use really dumb ways to die while melting your brain to beat each level.

name: The Shattered Elements Arena
description: The Shattered Elements Arena is a controller based top-down 2D physics action game for 1-4 players. Test if your squad of mages can maneuver through four zones of dangerous encounters with the Jurisdiction inside an Arena the Wise Witch has deviously devised in order to train the Defiance.

name: Triclinium
description: Triclinium is a small comedy visual novel about a girl out of space who just wanted to eat.

name: The Search for MR Fimple
description: You can talk with people and go on Quests , Collect GLORBS , Drive a Car , Fly a Helicopter , Try a "Challenge" and much more !

name: Explosive Snooker
description: A game of dodgeball on a snooker table

name: Focus indies Bundle: Curse of the Dead Gods + Shady Part of Me + Aeon Must Die!
description: The Focus Indies Bundle: Curse of the Dead Gods + Shady Part of Me + Aeon Must Die!

name: Live Adventure
description: Throw yourself into an exciting adventure! Live Adventure is a 2nd person game where you follow the journey of two young explorers, Lence and Reel in search of their parents. Solve the mysteries of a lost civilization while exploring a lush forest littered with mysterious ruins.

name: Sandboxels
description: Sandboxels is an in-browser falling sand simulation game, with mechanics such as heat simulation, electricity, density, chemical reactions, fire, and over 500 unique elements to play with.

name: Warframe: The New War
description:
Experience The New War, Warframe's largest cinematic expansion yet. Fight on the frontlines in every corner of the Origin System in a thrilling storyline of exploration and discovery. Unite opposing forces and test your mettle against the full mustered force of the Sentients, a legion of adaptable, self-replicating drones capable of untold destruction. You must stop them, Tenno, and reckon with the Lotus, or all you have fought to protect will fall to ruin.

With several new playable characters, a new Warframe, a dramatic cinematic Quest, and an Arsenal reinforced with new Customizations, Weapons and Accessories, get ready to wield limitless power to look and play the way you want in this all-out-war.

name: Biggerman.io
description: One left-stick rules them ALL! Biggerman - a simple yet satisfying action game for everyone! Smash! Absorb! And Get Bigger!

name: Aeterna Noctis: Deluxe Edition
description: The Aeterna Noctis Deluxe Edition includes the complete game plus the 3 official DLCs to date: Artist Map, Game Soundtrack, and Exclusive Wallpapers. The best way to experience Aeterna Noctis is by purchasing this epic bundle!

name: Mission Critical: Foresight
description: When scientists resumed their Unified Field Theory experiments this time the succeeded- with devastating consequences. You are trapped on a desolate Lunar Base with only your wits, real world astronaut weapons and a heads up display to give you instructions.

name: Superposition
description: Superposition is a simple sokoban style puzzle game about duplication. By splitting yourself into multiple copies you have to maneuver onto all goal tiles simultaneously to progress.

name: Eraser
description: Throw your stick-figure-self at cannonballs and airplanes in an upward pursuit of the eraser! Play cooperatively online to share the journey! Who's to say whether the company will help or hinder, though...

name: Doge Dash
description: Doge Dash is a Mario Run inspired PLAY-TO-EARN game; collect coins that transfer directly to your Crypto wallet. Crypto Gaming Made Easy!

name: Can't Let Go
description: Can't Let Go is a 2d narrative platformer. Connect with the heart and mind of the protagonist and help them work through a tough part of their life with simple timing-based gameplay.

name: Void Frame
description: Void Frame is a 2d platformer. Move,jump and dash ,through various sorts and varieties items, completed one and after levels,meet final boss and defeaut it.

name: Doctor Who: Worlds Apart
description: Doctor Who: Worlds Apart is a fast-paced trading card game set in the wide universe of the official Doctor Who series. Players create decks of cards made up of a wide variety of characters, items and phenomena and use these to do battle with opponents. Establish yourself as supreme with a Dalek-dominated deck or mix it up with a combination of Doctors and Cybermen, the choice is yours. All card artwork has been hand-drawn by our talented artists and approved by our official partners, the BBC.

name: There Will Be No Turkey This Christmas
description: Christmas is coming, and your goal is to spoil it! After all, you are the turkey! Hide in the barrel so you won't be seen by your enemies. Be stealthy! You are escaping, after all. Seek the keys to make your way to freedom and escape all 7 members of the Silva family. Pass through hidden tunnels in the house so the enemies do not see you! Collect items to make new skins available. Take on the 30 levels and win the challenge of not becoming a roast turkey.

name: Space Docker VR
description: A “Newtonian physics” space-flight simulator for VR! Get in the cockpit, pilot a spacecraft, navigate hazardous environments, and compete with your friends to become the ultimate docker!

name: Babble Royale
description: Babble Royale is an intense multiplayer free-for-all that combines word-making skill with fast-paced tactical and strategic action. Earn money and collect loot to upgrade your abilities, outrun the deadly hot zone, and outwit or outlast all your opponents to have the Last Word!

name: Violation
description: Violation is a First Person Horror Game that takes Place in many other Worlds.

name: Hashihime of the Old Book Town append
description: After the release of many related titles, a Taisho Era boy's love mystery - "Hashihime of the Old Book Town", will be ported to Nintendo Switch!

name: Drifting: Weight of Feathers
description: A third-person-action game with a special emphasis on aerial-combat. Players need to utilize grappling hook and acrobatics to fight enemies, solve puzzles to progress through each level.

name: Sin Chronicle
description: Sin Chronicle is a “successor” to the Chain Chronicle series for smartphones.

name: Starry Knight
description: Walk in Van Gogh’s paintings. Fight with the struggle that he went through in his life. Unveil the destiny of the starry, starry knight.Starry Knight is a 2D boss rush game focusing on unique boss design and hardcore action combat.

name: Key
description: Come venture into a dangerous dungeon full of enemies and deadly traps with Key! An insane and addictive platform action game. Help Zeno find the keys he needs to explore all the rooms of the dungeon and find out what really happened to the ones he loves.

name: Kukoos: Lost Pets
description: This is a 3D platformer that takes players to a new universe of limitless adventures. Join the Kukoos in a corky and upbeat adventure to rescue the brainwashed pets. Enter the Kukoo Tree and its infinite doors that take you to unimaginable words of dangers, secrets and wonders.

name: Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu
description: First person VR Kung Fu combat against a variety of different opponents, with a variety of different fighting styles, special moves and back stories

name: Filmechanism
description: A 2D puzzle action game where you aim to clear a stage by restore it after record it.

name: Rogue Invader
description: In Rogue Invader, YOU are the invader attacking the alien horde in this genre-flipping roguelite shooter. 1-Bit black and white old-school art style, with modern touches and HD graphics.

name: Aeterna Noctis
description: Aeterna Noctis is a challenging 2D hand-drawn action platformer, a Metroidvania with thrilling combat that will keep you on the edge of your seat and heart-stopping platform sections that will put your skills to the test. Become the King of Darkness in an epic journey through 16 connected areas.

name: Solar Rogue
description: A space exploration adventure in the purest tradition of roguelike. Featuring procedurally generated solar systems, perma-death and tactical turned-based gameplay!

name: Touhoumon Purple
description: In this Pokémon Emerald rom hack, trainers capture and battle animated 'puppets' based on characters from the Touhou series. The hack also updates the battle system, using a different set of type advantages/disadvantages and implementing the physical/special split from later Pokémon games.

name: Karryn's Prison
description:
In Karryn's Prison you play as Karryn, the new female Chief Warden of a notoriously lenient prison that has just rioted. Will you subjugate the rowdy inmates through force, or will you be subjugated yourself as your resistance towards their nonstop sexual advances start dropping?

Shape yourself and the prison the way you want to with the Edicts system! Struggle against sexual advances with the Willpower and Desire system! Become more and more vulnerable to sex with the Passives system! The current alpha version has gameplay up to the boss of Level 1.

name: Padria Online
description:
Experience true open-world freedom in Padria Online - Hardcore PVP massively multiplayer online role-playing game.
Choose from many different classes, decide whether to focus on PvP or PvE, both sharing the same world, no matter what in this full PVP game you will be entertained!
no matter your poison whether you combat, crafting, magic, trading, there is something for everyone.
Countless skills, resources and tools to master to old and control the lands.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Red Version: vs. Red
description: You meet Red at Mt. Silver, he wants to battle, but you force him into a rap battle.

name: Shark
description: Sin descripción

name: Ray Mohawk 2: Ray Wreaks Havoc!
description: Ray is BACK and ready for more vanilla-compatible action in the tropics! This is a community project and sequel to my older wad, Ray Mohawk's Manic Monday.

name: Fortnite: Voidlander Pack
description: Leave only destruction as you pass through the void. In Absenz you will find the path of the Voidlander.

name: Cyber Cars Punk Racing 2
description: Sin descripción

name: War Thunder: Merkava Mk.2D Pack
Kamen Ridertchi
description: The Kamen Ridertchi is a licensed Tamagotchi Nano model based on the Toei television series Kamen Rider, created to celebrate the show's 50th anniversary.

name: Assassin's Creed Valhalla: A Fated Encounter
description: A Fated Encounter was a virtual representation of one of Eivor Varinsdottir's genetic memories, relived by Layla Hassan in 2020 through the Portable Animus HR-8.5. It was added via Title Update 1.4.1.

name: Anno 1800: Vibrant Cities Pack
description: Make your cities more vibrant with more than 70 new looks for your Old World residential buildings and marketplaces.

name: Fydo's Magic Tiles
description: Fydo's Magic Tiles is a match-four action puzzle game for Game Boy and compatible systems. Match at least 4 tiles vertical or horizontal and clear them from the board. Pop magic bubbles with a match right next to them. Match 6 or more to start a combo, and keep matching to get bonus stars! Find and unlock all 17 Star Tiles to complete the game.

name: Spy Girls: Undercover Agent
description:
Drafted into the nation's spy network from a young age, you've never known anything outside the world of espionage. Alongside your fellow operatives, Mischa and Erina, you’re tasked with keeping the country safe and eliminating threats.

But with rival organizations closing in, and after a chance meeting with a famous singer with a dangerous secret, the pressure is on.

With lies and deception at every turn, it can be easy to forget who your friends are, but with the fate of the country in your hands, you can’t afford to lose!

name: Super Animal Royale: Season 2
description: This is the fourth battle pass. It started with the release of v1.2 and ended on April 5, 2022.

name: Quake: Xmas Jam 2021
description: Annual Christmas mapping event. This pack features 25 "small" maps in varying styles where all gameplay takes place within a 1024x1024x1024 space. It runs on Arcane Dimensions 1.8 (included) and comes with some additional content like sounds, models, skyboxes, and music tracks. The map sources are included.

name: Power Rangers: Battle for the Grid - Rita Repulsa
description: Play as Rita Ripulsa, the villain of Power Rangers!

name: The Psychoduck
description: The Psychoduck is a stealth game about a psychotic duck who collects crowns and has no problem killing all herons in order to increase his collection.

name: Survive the Island
description: survive the island you survive from skeletons and humans you can build and mine and level up your stats you can build whatever you want you can raid enemies you can mine and cut down trees and you have to hunt for your own food and you can grow your own crops and you can craft weapons

name: Zelda 2 Redux
description:
Have you always tried to play through Zelda II and finding out it was either excruciatingly difficulty, unbalanced, too tough or perhaps found that it just has so many quirks that doesn’t make the game enjoyable?

This hack tries to address that by rebalancing the game, making some QoL changes and also some visual flare into the game, without compromising the original game’s design.

name: Jericho Dungeon
description: 4 (and more) souls were lost in the dungeon, and the only clue was to follow the instructions to collect ancient coins. Every hero has unique advantages, choosing a character that suits your own style. Or, Avoid undead monsters in a dark and narrow space station, no chance of respawn.

name: Phoenix Hope
description: Phoenix Hope is a pixel art 2D real-time, side-view strategy game in which you must develop your colony during the day and repel waves of monsters at night.

name: Wayward Harbor
description: Short first-person horror experience with a unique mirror mechanic. Escape from an invisible monster that can be only seen in the reflection.

name: Planet Zoo: Europe Pack
description: Experience the beauty of Europe with the Planet Zoo: Europe Pack! Featuring five highly requested new animals (Alpine ibex, Eurasian lynx, European fallow deer, European badger, and fire salamander), these stunning European species will bring wonder and delight to your zoo.

name: Experiment of Being
description: Escape the room game with a story

name: Criminal Archives: City on Fire - Collector's Edition
description: San Francisco is shaken by a chain of horrible murders. You are the only one that can bring to justice a masked arsonist calling himself the Plague Doctor. Are you strong enough to face the challenge?

name: LinearShooter Remixed
description: "LinearShooter Remixed" is a game that combines vertical scrolling bullet hell shmup with rogue-lite that combine power-ups to build builds. Let's aim to clear the stage by assembling your ship with power-up while getting drunk with minimal and beautiful graphics and trance music.

name: Christmas Wonderland 12
description: Christmas Wonderland 12 is an indie adventure game. Enjoy magnificent Christmas festivities in Springfield. Help Santa at the North Pole. Visit Robot Toy Workshops, an Ice Palace, Petting Zoo & Grotto. See Dancer's new baby Reindeer.

name: Esten
description: A highly experimental bullet hell that plays unlike anything else. No auto scrolling, No credits, No holding back. Let Heaven's Chaos Reign!

name: LawnMower City
description: You control a lawnmower and need to cut all the grass and plants in the city. You have to be beware not to crash into traffic or get shot.

name: Fire & Steel
description: Fire & Steel is the first chapter of a fast-paced, old-school, arcade aerial shooter where you burn down the mighty armies of World War II as Ancient Dragon Aiden!

name: Drone Showcase
description: 'Drone Showcase' is an Action-Packed, Fast-Paced, Time-Trial Racing game used to feature the dynamic capabilities of our Physics-based drones! Smash through Rubble blocking your path, slip through Giant Ventilation fans, avoid Flammable Gas Pipes, Dodge projectiles & make it to the End!

name: Vortle
description: Vortle is anxiety management and stress relief app designed by and for neurodiverse, disabled, or mentally ill people.No need to register. No need to log in. Download now to instantly experience soothing games, safe spaces, and relaxing activities.

name: Bopping Drive
description: Strive to be the top driver as you combo your way through! Soar across the city's skyline as you leap between rooftops and smash weapon-wielding robots! Scrape your way to the next finish line in this modern golden-age styled arcade platformer.

name: Lapis Re:Lights
description: Lapis Re:LiGHTs is a Japanese RPG social simulation game launched in 2021. In this game you are the teacher and educate witch high school girls.

name: Let's Play! Oink Games
description: Wouldn’t it be great if we could play board games online even if we couldn’t meet in person? With Let's Play! Oink Games, you can play Oink Games' titles, Deep Sea Adventure, A Fake Artist Goes to New York, and more on your gaming console. You can play at home with your family, online with your friends, or test your skills against CPUs. Plenty of ways to play!

name: Too Many Santas!
description: A Christmas wish come true, or a holiday nightmare? The Santa Claus dating sim you can play all year round!

name: Asteroids: Recharged
description:
The original space shooter warps to the modern era! Asteroids: Recharged has been reimagined for modern gameplay, with vibrant visuals, powerful new abilities, and another original soundtrack from award-winning video game composer Megan McDuffee.

Asteroids: Recharged creates a familiar, but revitalized and modern challenge to both old school and new high score chasers. And 30 unique and creative challenge levels take the space shooting game play into new territory, complete with local and global leaderboards.

name: Humanities Legend: Hollow Ascending
description: A challenging yet forgiving souls-like action adventure. Parry, block, and dodge enemy attacks while exploring a ruined fort. Discover rich lore and epic boss fights.

name: Impious Pumpkins
description: Impious Pumpkins is a cute/spooky real time tactics game where you take control of your own ghostly army to defend their resting places from hordes of evil pumpkins!

name: Noble Fates
description: A 3D Fantasy Kingdom Sim driven by intelligent characters with a rich simulation of opinions and memories. Build, Craft, Farm, Mine, Hunt, Defend, and more! Command from the sky or take control in third person as your story goes where the people, your actions, and their reactions take it.

name: Dungeon Avenger
description: Your arch-nemesis and his goons have thrown you into one of the most dangerous dungeons – fight your way to freedom & revenge! Arcade-style hack & slash adventure. Procedurally generated levels: never see the same dungeon twice!

name: Among Us: Crewmate Edition
description:
Play online with 4-15 players as you attempt to hold your spaceship together and return back to civilization. But beware... as there may be an alien impostor aboard!

The Crewmate Edition includes:
- Base Game
- DLC items: Airship, Polus and MIRA HQ Skins, and Hamster Pet, Bedcrab Pet, Brainslug Pet, Stickmin Pet, and Mini Crewmate bundles
- 3D Lenticular Case
- Impostor Syndrome Sticker Sheet
- 1 of 12 Special Mira HQ Holographic Access Cards
- Folded Skeld Map Poster designed
- Redeemable Code for 6 PC/Phone Wallpapers

name: Strings Theory
description: Freaky, tricky logic game, with abstract concept and touching heroes.

name: Kingdoms of Amalur: Re-Reckoning - Fatesworn
description:
Brand new content that extends the game world by 5+ hours.

Agarth visits you and explains that the resurrection by the gnome in the Well of Souls has caused massive disruptions to the Weave. You are the ‘epicentre’ of the potential dissolution of the Weave or the beginning of the first threads that will start to unravel in the Weave.

name: Firegirl: Hack 'n Splash Rescue
description: Take on the role of a young rescue officer starting her career. Armed with a trusty axe and high-pressure fire hose that also acts like a jetpack, Firegirl responds to emergency calls across the city. Can Firegirl save all the trapped civilians caught in each blaze?

name: Praey for the Gods
description:
"Praey for the Gods" is a brutal journey set on a desolate frozen island, where your only chance of survival is to destroy the very gods you believe in.

In Praey for the Gods, you play a lone hero sent to the edge of a dying world to discover the mystery behind a never-ending winter. Arriving with only the clothes on your back, you must survive the colossal dangers that you encounter. To restore balance and reclaim the land from the brink, you will be faced with questions that not even a God knows the answer to."

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: Those Who Are Treasured
description: This is part 1 of the Assassin's Creed Crossover Stories that had Kassandra travel to the island of Korfu to explore the aftermath of obtaining the immortality-granting Staff of Hermes Trismegistus

name: Mario Jam
description: This is a hack with 6 worlds. Each world has 4 levels, for a total of 24 exits.

name: Shopping Clutter 13: Mr. Claus On Vacation
description: Sin descripción

name: Othercide: Dressed to Kill - Cosmetics Pack
description: Expand the variety and flair of your daughters' looks with the Dressed to Kill - Cosmetics Pack including outfit, eye and weapon skin variations. Tailor each Daughter's appearance before sending them to battle the Suffering.

name: Super Spatial
description: Super Spatial lets you create and explore millions of player created experiences with friends and players around the world.

name: Nobetsu Maku Nashi
description: Nobetsu Maku Nashi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame created by Chiriakuta in WOLF RPG Editor.

name: Sleepi Boi Can't Sleep
description: Help Sleepi Boi find a way to sleep well. It's a rainy night while you explore his house along the way.

name: Five Nights at Freddy's AR: Special Delivery - Dark Circus: Encore!
description: Visit the Mixed Reality World of the Dark Circus. Hunt down clues to solve puzzles and win exclusive content. One time payment required, replayable environment.

name: ThumBeat: Button Basher Edition
description: ThumBeat: Button Basher Edition is a short-form, button-bashing rhythm game for busy people!

name: Mystery Trackers: Queen of Hearts - Collector's Edition
description: The townspeople of Brightfield are becoming infected by a mysterious illness and turning into monsters! This is no simple investigation as you struggle to save both the townspeople and yourself. Can you stop whoever is behind the infection in time? Find out in this spine-tingling hidden-object puzzle adventure!

name: My University Girlfriend
description: This is a relaxing and casual puzzle game that can train your memory and observation skills. The after-school life in Angel Academy is always so colorful, and the graceful and colorful figures in the club are full of youth and vitality. Here, what kind of beautiful encounter will be waiting for you?

name: Yavi
description: A retro styled 2D Sci-Fi RPG including robot fighting, hilarious dialogues and a great story that will make you laugh and cry - if you're a sensitive person (which is nothing to be ashamed of!).

name: Love Notes
description: Play as Rachel or Jesse in this horror dating sim featuring 2 male and 3 female love interests.

name: Spheriums
description: A fantasy single-player journey of exploration through beautiful worlds to discover the elder’s secret for saving a dying homeworld.

name: Spoockey
description: Who cares about Christmas! We wanted Halloween all year long, so we made Spoockey, a competitive multiplayer air hockey/block break mashup to satisfy your creepy cravings

name: Spiritfarer: Farewell Edition
description: Spiritfarer is a cozy management game about dying. As ferrymaster to the deceased, build a boat to explore the world, care for your spirit friends, and release them into the afterlife. The Spiritfarer Farewell Edition includes the heartwarming base game and three major content updates.

name: Sniper Time: The Shooting Range
description: Test yourself at the firing range shooting different types of rifles competing with a stopwatch. Different levels and targets are waiting for you. Ready? Some tips for you. Use proper gun for each situation. When you're getting ready to fire, hold your breath. Squeeze the trigger softly.Use a solid rest to improve accuracy. Don't forget to reload. It's your time. Good luck!

name: Circa Infinity: Ultimate Edition
description:
Circa Infinity: Ultimate Edition is an arcade puzzle platformer filled with action. Reach the core of each level by slipping through a series of circular layers. Time your jumps carefully to avoid the creatures that reside within the circles and reach the next layer. As you go deeper, the action gets faster and more challenging! Can you keep up? The standard mode includes 50 stages of mind-bending action, with 5 bosses that will test your nerves. You can also measure your time yourself in speedrun mode.

In Ultimate Edition you'll put your skills to the ultimate test! The additional Affinity mode is a new endless mode with level after level of increasing difficulty. The progress you make each time will bring you closer to unlocking 60 new color themes, making Circa Infinity: Ultimate Edition an extremely visual experience! This is paired with new songs and remixes of songs. Hypnotic visuals and a pumping soundtrack will turn up the already intense gameplay experience.

name: Good Day
description: Explore a Chinese rice field themed casino and face your worst fears.

name: Granblue Fantasy: Versus - Legendary Edition
description:
Embark on a new fight, O champions of the skies! Take a ringside seat for this brawltastic work! An exciting new title in the Granblue Fantasy series is finally revealed! Featuring stunning visuals, heart-pounding music, and innovative game mechanics, it’ll usher in a new era of fighting games! This fantasy game blends fighting game action and RPG-style adventure. Throw yourself into matches or enjoy powering up your characters! Adding Vira and Avatar Belial to the roster, this version includes every DLC character for an experience that's truly legendary.

Granblue Fantasy: Versus - Legendary Edition includes:
- Granblue Fantasy: Versus (main game)
- Playable Character 'Vira'
- Playable Character 'Avatar Belial'
- All Serial Codes for the Original 'Granblue Fantasy'
- Character Pass 1 & 2 (unlocks all 11 DLC playable characters):
- Pass 1: Beelzebub, Narmaya, Soriz, Djeeta, and Zooey
- Pass 2: Belial, Cagliostro, Yuel, Anre, Eustace, and Seox

name: Scrapland Remastered
description: The cult game that marked MercurySteam's origins returns; a sci-fi adventure with memorable characters, powerful ships and humor! Enjoy intense Multiplayer battles and races with ships you build.

name: Cloud Escape
description:
Cloud Escape is a fast-paced 3D precision platformer with countless traps, obstacles and cool movement mechanics. Whether you're dashing through the large, themed areas in Classic Mode or trying to climb to the top in the new game mode: The Tower.
Both game modes have their own worlds with unique challenges, traps, secrets and collectibles. In the new tower, you'll even encounter real enemies for the first time!

name: Timerunner
description: Take on the role of a mysterious character known only as "The Alien Traveler" and lead him on an intergalactic journey from beyond the starts all the way to our planet Earth.

name: Mumba IV: Egypt Jewels
description: Go to Egypt on an amazing adventure and explore all the ancient temples full of diamonds! If you're best (You are best!), you’ll rack up special bonuses, that'll help you in dangerous temples.

name: Grim Dungeon
description:
Grim Dungeon is a vertical slice of a JRPG project, made with Godot.
Crawl through the dungeon and defeat the final boss by using your abilities intelligently.

name: Z.A.P.
description: Zzzzzz zzz zzzz ZOMBIES! Protect your fortress from the onslaught of zombies headed your way. Put each zombie at peace. Stop zombies attacking people. You can't rest until all zombies are perished!

name: Dick Hook
description: Draw all the girls in the game, without exception! Visit colorful winter locations and real space! Play and have fun with pleasant music!

name: Super Special World
description:
Welcome to Super Special World!

Mario has happened upon a strange new area located within what seems to be a continuation of the mysterious Special Zone. Romp through a variety of stage themes, including some atypical of the original, and discover all that Super Special World has in store.

If you enjoy a rather classic SMW experience, you're in for a treat - This hack is designed to feel like an extension of the original game (with embellishments).

name: Learning English With Takako
description: Set before the prologue of the visual novel we have Sachiko and Takako practicing their English in anticipation for their upcoming trip to the southern islands of Australia. A peek into the lives of Sachiko and Takako in this fan visual novel.

name: Motherbird: The Dark One
description:
Motherbird Captured You. You are in abandoned Hospital. Place is full of dangers and hidding places.
Motherbird can hear you always. So be quiet and try to get out of this prison.
Escape or die trying. That is your goal! You have 5 days.
Good Luck!

name: Had
description: Darkness stole all of your stuff. let's get it back!

name: War of the Worlds
description:
This is a fan-made standalone game that uses the Tomb Raider The Last Revelation engine while creating its own story, puzzles and mechanics.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.
